Description:
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.
Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Convenient in-line controls allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, making it easy to take calls on the go.
Universal Compatibility: These earphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. The standard 3.5mm jack ensures easy connectivity to any device with a headphone port.
review: These headphones are pretty damn good for the money! Its just as good--if not--better than most of the competitors producing in-ear headphones that cost more than 5-10x as much. There's no reason to spend Â£100-100+ on some in-ear headphones when you can simply pick these up at less than a fraction of the cost. I would highly recommend these to anyone considering them. The clarity is consistent and the bass is AMPLE. Your music will sound full and dynamic making a pleasurable experience for any sound played through them. Not to mention, the quality is durable and they will last for months. I'd give this a 6 Star rating if possible.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Earbuds that give you great sound for a small price!
review: These earbuds will change the way you look at the this brand brand. I've always thought most of the stuff this brand made was kind of cheap and looking at these earbuds and their price it was hard not to think the same about them as well. But, even being a really big skeptic of them even after reading review after review on these earbuds of how amazing they were I ordered a pair to make own decision about how good they actually were. After getting them I quickly followed the advice of one of the reviews I had read and found the right size ear pads that go over the earbuds to make sure I had the best fit possible with them. After listening to them for a week straight 7-8hrs. a day and with different kinds of music rock, r&b, trance, etc... to make sure they were getting a full rounded break in period they became music to my ears! The lows, mids, and highs were exactly what I was looking for so long in some earbuds! I couldn't believe my ears! These earbuds really did deliver! I've tried Audio Technica's earbuds with some people claiming they sounded as good as the ATH-M50x's (which is a pretty big claim) only to find out that the reviewer was wrong they weren't even close to how good the ATH-M50x's sounded. They lacked bass and the highs were ear piercing! With the this brand's it was all there and well balanced and they get better and better the more I use them. If you're looking for a good pair of earbuds don't pass these up. You can't beat what you get for what a small price you pay for these earbuds.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are, hands down, the best pair of in-ear headphones I've ever owned. Luckily, I read some of the reviews on here, so that I could realize the first fact I stated. You must use the rubber ear inserts that fit snugly in your ear. You'll get plenty of fine, clear tones in all the right range if you're wearing them properly.The sound is clear, rich and true, NOT scratchy or squeaky like many cheaper in-ear headphones. I'll leave these in a pocket or something and have my JVC earphones nearby, and they don't even compare to these. I immediately look for these headphones if I want to listen to something clearly. Furthermore, they block out sound almost as well as earplugs with how they fit on myself.Lastly, it seems to me that they are ergonomically designed to fit in the ear better. First: the rubber on the ear-insert is very pliable/soft. Second: the rubber ear-inserts take on a tilted oval shape because of the shape of the earphone speakers themselves. This makes them very comfortable to wear, even with the largest rubber ear-insert size (it comes with 3 sizes of rubber inserts/covers) that makes the best seal. Many, cheaper, in ear headphones are uncomfortable to wear and make your ears sore, but you can wear these all day without something stretching out your ear.

review_bold: AMAZING, especially when you consider the price!!!
review: What can I say about these ear buds?#1 They go into the ear canal, and I have no idea if they have noise reduction... but I can't hear anything or anyone else when I'm at the gym listening to music. This is GREAT.#2 Base is deep and quite excellent.#3 Clear sound I haven't had any crackling yet.#4 I'm 6'2 and my only issue with these is that the cord is SLIGHTLY, and when I say slightly I really mean slightly too short for me. Maybe an inch or so too short. I don't mean they don't reach my head, I just have a preference for some leeway when I put them in my ears. And this feels a lil snugger on the cord than I'm used too. (Not an issue with the product just a preference)#5 Did I mention the price???? Â£10??? REALLY??????? Jesus these are amazing when you factor this in. I'm considering getting 2 more pairs to keep around at home and in my car for whenever, just because they're so affordable and I get sad when I don't have them on me, but would love to listen to some music.Conclusion;There's a reason why these bad boys are at 4.5 star and reviewed by over 1+k people. They are that good for the price and you would be a fool not to get a pair of these just to have for whenever/whatever. Leave em in your car!!! I grantee you will thank me when you need a pair of ear-buds, but you left your favorite pair at home without thinking. Then, a few seconds into your despair ... "Oh, that's right!!!! I have a backup pair in my car!!! Thanks random amazon dude!" So, you're welcome ahead of time!

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These things are incredible for the price. I've used earbuds regularly for over a months while exercising, while working in landscaping/farming, and presently as an attorney. The different types of work affect sound quality, given the types of ambient noise one experiences, the jostling of the headphones from movement, etc. In addition, I only buy headphones that are no more than Â£100, preferably less than Â£10, because I have a tendency to lose and/or destroy them. These are, hands down, the best pair I've ever had, even better than the Â£100 Beats I used to buy. The fit is perfect, they do not jostle around in your ear, and because the fit is so snug (without being annoying), they eliminate ambient noise extremely well. For example, on a plane you barely notice the engine sound (relative to any other headphones I've owned).And the sound quality is the best I've ever experienced by long shot for a pair of earbuds. The bass is deep and full, mids are actually pronounced, and the treble is not piercing like it is frequently in earbuds. The clarity for something like jazz is not perfect if your an audiophile, but still better than anything else at this price point, or at numerous price points above it.NOTE: In order to maximize sound quality, you have to use the rubber piece that fits snugly into your ear. You also HAVE to wear the R headphone in your right ear and the L headphone in you left ear. I guarantee the reviewers complaining about the lack of bass are not wearing them correctly. When you do, the sound is nothing short of astonishing for pair of budget earbuds.

Product Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Great Sound and Good Enough Fit, see my comparisons
review: Very good sounding, tied for favorite, see comparisons below to other earbuds. You must pay attention and use the right tip for your ear, as this design does not go deep in ear and thus needs the right rubber tip to get good sound isolation.I compared the ergo-Fit on cell phone and laptop outputs, 6 different songs and the with other earbuds listed below:this brand Ergo-Fit ~Â£10.These are one of my two favorites due to better fit than HAFX1X and almost as good of sound, slightly better sound than Ink'd but not as good of fit -Bass-Excellent, not too boomy -Mid, Good -Highs, Good, not too much (like Ink'ed) -Comfort, Good, a little bit noticeable, but you can wear for many hours. Noise Isolation fit is good, you need experiment with tips to get it right as these leave no margin for error as they do not go deep into ear canal. However they tend to stay in place.SKULLCANDY Ink'd - Â£11 Ok, no distortion, sometimes short on bass, good for vocals -Bass, good, but a little weak, if positioned well in ear bass can be good -Mid, Excellent, very clear vocals -Highs, Good, perhaps a little too much volume highs -Fit, Very comfortable and best at noise isolation, fitting deep in ear canal, making them my favorite along with the JVC HAFX1X Â£25 - Beautiful sounds, well balanced, nice bass -Bass, OK, the best you'll ever experience in earbuds, almost too much. -Mid, Good, very clear vocals, despite a very rich bass -High, Excellent -Fit, I find it difficult to get them just deep enough to get good noise isolation, using the medium tips. But this made them to be uncomfortable and they WORK THEMSELVES LOOSE (from tight noise isolation fit). In general not uncomfortable, but very noticeable in ear due to large sizeMEELECTRONICS M6 - 18Â£ Very good,clear sound, no distortion, well balanced -Bass, Excellent, rich and natural sound, almost booming -Mid, Excellent, very clear vocals -Highs, Good, clear no distortion -Fit, Only seam to get good noise isolation fit with long triple flanged tip, but these are not comfortable to wear more than an hour or two.PHILIPS SHE6000/28 ~Â£14 -Balanced high, mid, and low ranges -Fit, comfortable since they don't go into ear much, 4 different size tips. Don't fit tight in ear, as not designed to go deep enough. Thus little noise isolation, and not suited to noisy environment. None-the-less, even though the do NOT seal-in the sound via tight fit, they seem to have good frequency balance. Also, not good to use for activities, as they easy to fall out. -Nice carry caseSONY MDR-EX300SL - 25Â£, Horrible, booming bass, distorted -Bass, Ok, booming, too much -Mid, horrible, distorted vocals -Highs, Bad, not present, no highs at all

Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Some of the best Earphones I have ever had.
review: When you look at them, the design may appear to be uncomfortable given its odd shape, however, this shape causes the ear buds to more snuggly fit into your ears. They produce good, clear sound quality and have a decent length.Now, I am not good at taking care of my things, I tend to break things, a lot. All my previous earphones have broken within one-to-two months, especially since I buy the cheap, 5-to-10 pound ones, however, the pair of these I bought has lasted me now around a months and have no sign of wear-and-tear.The only problem I can think of with these is that the ear pads tend to be a little unsecured. This means that they will sometimes fall off when you do not have them in your ear, this is not a common occurance, but it does happen sometimes. This personally wasn't a problem because I usually find the ear pads in my pocket, and even when I did not, which was once, I simply used the excess ear pads the earphones came with.All-in-all, this is a superb pair of earphones, they are light-weight, sturdy, have god audio quality, and are overall some of the best I have ever had.Final Score: 5/5

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Good, cheap, and durable -- that sums it up nicely.
review: These earbuds are very good and when used properly, i.e., fit *snugly* into the ears, have good-to-excellent bass response -- something I know a little about, as I've played bass guitar for months and I reflexively listen to the low end first whenever I hear a new song. On sound alone, I would give them a four-star rather than a five-star rating, as they are the slightest bit muddy in the mid-range compared to really good headphones. And I'm being picky, I know.However, what pushes my review to the five-star level is durability: I am extremely hard on earbuds, listening to my mp3 player while doing carpentry, gardening, hiking through brush, working in the kitchen, etc. and I cannot tell you how many times I've caught the cord on something and yanked the 'buds out of my ears or the jack out of its socket and yet I've had only one failed set of these earbuds after over a months(!) of daily use. I have stepped on one or the other of the buds at least three times, cracked the 'bud cases twice and after an application of super-glue, they worked as if nothing had ever happened. Alas, after all of this brutal treatment, the left 'bud stopped producing sound, so I finally had to pull my unopened, three-month-old backup set out of my sock drawer.Just lucky with the one pair of 'buds? I don't think so -- I have the same brand and model earbuds on my secondary mp3 player which I've used nearly as much under harsh conditions for over two months and they're still performing great. I'm a frugal (read "cheap") and active guy who hates buying expensive earbuds, only to have to replace them within three to a months. (If it were illegal, I would have been convicted of bud-abuse months ago.)So here you have these this brand earbuds that are comfortable, affordable, sound good, and are very durable. What more could a person ask for in a set of earbuds for daily use?

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: To say I'm blown away is putting it mildly. Now, maybe this means I've just had rotten luck 'til now, but prior to this set, every budget pair of earbuds I've tried, (Â£10-15 range), has left me frustrated and sorely disappointed: I've gotten thin and tinny sound with no bass, or muddy sound with no trebble AND no bass... Often barely a step up from the free set on the airplane. I've spent 4 times the cost of these on a skullcandy pair that proved entirely unlistenable. I'd nearly abandoned hope of a worry-free set I could batter in my usual merciless way and still ENJOY listening to. And then, I gave it just one more try...Now, they don't exactly look expensive, and I'll never claim these sound just like my beloved Klipsch or Audiofly earbuds: anyone expecting that from six pound earbuds needs a quick reality check. BUT, I'm also not about to shove those Klipsch and Audiofly investments into a jacket pocket every time I'm racing out the door, (dropping them repeatedly), or leave them on during naps, or say, have them anywhere in view when my audiophile cat is in the mood to examine the wires with her teeth. What the this brand does is offer sound that's crisp and dynamic enough to be properly enjoyed, with a pretty comfortable design, and at a price so affordable -- and so far below anything remotely comparable -- that the cat can have her own set if she wants it.It's just plain impressive.

review_bold: 29,051 Reviewers and One Lithuanian Could Not Be Wrong
review: Why bother to write a review about this products? Because I did not experience any of the primary negatives:1. Poor quality sound: I did not find this to be true. The sound quality and volume varies according to the device they are plugged into due to variations in the impedance of the device.These are 16 ohm impedance earbuds designed for portable devices that do not have a lot of power. If under- or over-powered the quantity and quality of the sound will suffer. I plugged them into my laptop and listened via VLC: no issues; into my custom PC with Logitech 5-1 sound system: no issues; into my Moto: no issues; into my Fire HD and Fire 7: no issues. As far as my ear is able to tell, the advertised frequency response of 20-20kHz is as claimed.2. There was one review that said these buds did not work with a cellphone case. Apparently the reviewer does not realize that, on the black market, one can purchase special cases that will permit these buds to work. The secret is to buy a case that is designed for your phone so that it permits access to all of the ports and camera lenses.3. Poor quality: these appear to me to be of a better quality that the 3-pair for Â£10 earbuds that I have been using for the past a months so I anticipate they will last at least as long. But, I just bought these so I cannot say.4. Uncomfortable: this I really do not understand, especially "after 5 minutes." These earbuds come with three earpieces: 1.3cm, 1.15cm, and 1.0cm by my measurements. I chose the earpieces that give me a firm enough fit that they do not fall out. Over the past hour or so, I have been wearing these and have no issues. I suppose if one employs the largest earpieces and jams them in as far as the tympanic membrane, they might prove uncomfortable.For me, these are great: good sound, good comfort, good price. Oh, and BTW, I am the Lithuanian.Ed

review_bold: Earbuds fit like a dream and the sound quality is AWESOME!!!!
review: These earbuds are unbelievable. I've been shopping for a new pair for over a month now and tried many brands from the ifrogz with the noise cancelation to the ifrogz luxe microbud, and both the silver and gold versions of the alltec lansing "ladies" versions. The this brand buds are hands down my favorite. They fit perfectly, they are not to big or to small. The alltec lansing I found to be too small so they feel out just like buds that are too big. The ifrogz are a close second to the this brand, however because of the fit and the high quality of sound the this brand are "it". The noise cancellation ability of the this brand is A+ and the sound quality was not sacrificed a bit as the connection of the earbuds to my mp3 player is "spot on". It's like a personal concert in my ears!! It seems to have an equal balance of bass and trebile which makes for good sound quality. However the best part really is the earbuds ability to cancel out background noise. I suffer from seizures and these will be a great help in blocking out noises I DON'T want to hear, and pump in music I do want to hear. It tricks my brain into focusing on the music and not the background noise which tends to bring seizures on. These will be a great help!!!

review_bold: After one month's use and a cycle through the washing machine
review: The best earbuds I have ever used.I have gone through many many brands and types of earbuds over the months looking for a decent set. I am fairly hard on them as I use them during commuting, working out in the gym, riding my bike, snowboarding, etc. Every other pair I have purchased has failed after 3-a months. I have been using these earbuds for almost a month straight now and they sound as good as when I bought them.The thing that prompted me to write this review and also solidified my love for these was yesterday when I was doing laundry and discovered that I had left these in a sweatshirt pocket and they went through an entire washing machine cycle. I was bummed out but figured I would just order another pair. Just to be sure though, I let them dry out for a bit and plugged them in to my phone - they still work and sound perfect.I can't say enough good things about these, you will not believe the quality you get for such a small price.UPDATE: The earbuds finally failed today. If they had lasted until tomorrow, it would have been exactly one month since I purchased them. I still think they are the best choice for the price as my month (OK, 364 days) of use included lots of abuse and almost every day use. RIP little buddies.

review: These are my go-to cheapo headphones for when I need to listen to music with an OK sound but wouldn't be sad if I lost them. I buy a couple of these at a time and will eventually lose one only to replace it with another. The sound quality is good enough and they are one of the most comfortable in-ear headphones I've used. They come with multiple ear pad sizes for those of us with tiny or huge ear holes. They last for quite a while and are a great value at their price.

review: These work better than any others we've tried yet, including an active-noise-reduction set. Sound quality is excellent. They stay in ear canals better than any others we've used, although they too tend to gradually work loose and have to be re-seated every ten or fifteen minutes. They block ambient noise quite well when fully inserted. The price is more than reasonable. We now have three of these; two we use all the time, and one spare. My advice is to keep them clean. I wipe them off after every use and use q-tips to clean the inside of them every few times also. So long as you do that it appears they might last forever.

review: These are great headphones, especially for the price. I could imagine paying at least Â£20 for this quality. The design of the headphones are perfect because they fit snugly in the ear. Even for long periods of time, they feel great. The sound is fine. Although the bass isn't as pronounced as it would be on more expensive headphones, these are fine. The sound isn't trebble heavy like many of the cheaper headphones.Overall, these headphones are the BEST for their price range.

review: These are fantastic for the price, and I love the variety of colors. I ordered the Black pair, and I am in no way disappointed! To test them, I played a song that had a considerable amount of bass; the quality of sound is phenomenal for "In-Ear headphones." I would recommend these to everyone I know; best pair of earbuds I've ever had!Update: I have had these headphones for over two months now, and the quality is still awesome. I am a college student, so I am constantly studying with these in my ears. They block sound well and provide a great sound. I honestly don't think I'll ever stray from buying these specific headphones.

review: These tiny and very economical earphones provide astonishingly wide ranging sound.I now use these mobile to replace my Sony MDR V6 over the ear phones for criticalstereo with my iPod Classic. They are extremely comfortable and within a few secondsare no longer noticeable in my ears, providing a truly vivid presence for the music.Classical, jazz, country, pop, and all other genres are brightly projected with a remarkablesensation.As must be expected, very low frequency organ notes are hardly there, but the rest of thespectrum is crisp, sharp, and puts you right there in the midst of the sound source.An exceptional buy.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: My kids love these lights. Love that you can choose brightness, color, and the speaker is fabulous. Would give it six stars if I could. We bought two.

review: The best earbuds I've owned and I've owned many. I purchased this item last week and sadly someone stole them recently from my backpack, if not I bet they would last me another month. Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Don't let the price fool you, these are amazing
review: To say that these earbuds are the best bang for your buck is actually an understatement. These headphones are purely amazing.I currently own a pair of ATH-M50s (http://www.amazon.com/Audio-Technica-ATH-M50-Professional-Monitor-Headphones/dp/B000ULAP4U) paired with a Fiio E10 and have been rocking it for about 3 months now at the desk. Since the ATH-M50s are gigantic, I wanted something I can take around while I commute on the train and go to the gym. I was set to find something inexpensive yet really good for the price. I have a cat who is notorious for chewing cords, so I can't spend too much.I stumbled upon these, and with a price of 5.99, I thought it was a no-brainer to at least try them out.My first experience:The first time I popped them in, I found them to be incredibly dull and tinny. I almost thought about throwing them in the trash, but decided to at least use them as earplugs while on the train. I thought all of the reviewers were crazy for giving these headphones 5 stars. I then decided to just give it another shot and keep listening to music on my iPhone. After a couple days, the headphones quickly broke in and I found the sound to be SIGNIFICANTLY better.Fast forward about a month, I've been using them almost every day on the train. They're great! Not as great as my M50s, but surprisingly close, especially for earbuds.Today, I decided to plug in these earbuds (broken-in) into my Fiio amplifier and compare the quality to my broken-in M50s. The results were shocking. I found the clarity to be almost on-par, with it sounding just a tad bit "hollower" than the M50s. It's barely noticeable. These headphones can successfully compete with headphones that are 20x the price. Amazing!I'd recommend these headphones to anyone. They're really comfortable and I've had no problems with them falling out. These will definitely last a few months.

review_bold: Finally ear buds that do not hurt my ears and stay put!
review: These fit perfectly in my ears (and if they didn't... they come with other sizes). Over-the-ears headphones hurt my ears and sometimes in-ear headphones hurt too. This is the only pair I have found that does not hurt my ears. Also, when they are in my ears and I have the volume turned up... I can't hear ANYTHING else.I use them to work out and they do not come out of my ears (even when running). They are also very "light". I use them on my laptop and cellphone too.

review: These are awesome headphones! I have been through too many ear buds which have all broke throughout the months. Finally instead of buying expensive headphones which would be bound to break anyway, i found these which are extremely cheap but sound amazing! They are more comfortable than any Skullcandy or Sony headphones i have had. They sound just as good as Skullcandy and seem like they will last much longer. Great product overall! Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: One of the best products I've purchased on Amazon.
review: These are, without question, the best headphones/earbuds I've ever owned. I'll keep this review short, but here are the highlights.Pros:* Affordable: You can buy 10 pairs of these for the price of a single pair of their competitors. After trying out my first pair, I've since bought a pair for my bedroom, home office, and office at work to complement the pair that I bring with me everywhere when out-and-about. So now I always have a pair of headphones right where I need them, and this was achieved for under Â£100. . Surprisingly high-quality audio: these little earbuds reliably output beautiful, crisp audio with shockingly deep bass that I can feel in my toes. I honestly was shocked to hear so much more in some of my favorite songs with these than my previous, more expensive headphones.* Comfort: This is of course very personal and what works for me may not work for you, but I have had no issue comfortably wearing these through long plane flights, while running on a treadmill/outdoors (connected to my beloved Sansa Clip), gaming, and listening to podcasts/youtube videos at home. I've worn them for 5+ hours before without my ears getting sore.* Noise-cancellation: I forget if they're even billed as doing this, but the earbuds fit snugly enough to REALLY drown out sound. I've been watching a movie on my laptop before when my roommate and several of his friends arrived at home, greeted me, sat down behind me, and scared me half to death after realizing I'd heard none of the above. They're phenomenal for when you need to drown out your surroundings to relax or just get some things done.Cons:None. Seriously these are among my all time most satisfying purchases, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for earbuds.The only thing that has been a slight inconvenient for me a few times is cord length. These are about 3.6 feet long according to the listing (I was going to guess 3 or 4 feet), which means, for example, they're not going to stretch behind your desk and to the backside of a PC tower sitting on the floor. While there are easy ways to solve these problems (like buying a male-to-female 3.5mm cord (for about Â£10 or less) and keep the female end on your desk), it is something to keep in mind if you're not intending to use them with a nearby MP3 player or phone.At the same time, the relatively short cord length makes these headphones *ideal* for using while active. I can use these with my Sansa Clip attached to my running shorts when exercising very comfortably. While there is inevitably still some give in the cord (and the cord does sway a bit while I jog), I don't have to worry about it flailing wildly and or having to bundle up the slack cord before I get to exercising. For reference, I'm about 6'2". So if you're in the 7' range you should probably look to use them with an MP3 player/phone on an armband!I'll update this review if and when one of my 4 pairs finally gives out, but at this point you can rest assured that I'll be replacing them with a new pair of these same earbuds!

They are very comfortable, are designed well, and sound fantastic.I was looking for 2 pairs of throwaway headphones - one to leave by my bed, and one to carry around. I tend to lose headphones often, so I wasn't looking to spend much. Based on the great reviews, I went for these. The reviews were spot on. I got much more than I could have expected from a cheap pair of headphones. I would recommend these to anyone!

review: Oh my, you wouldn't believe this! I have been using this earbug for over a month already and it still works great! No damages, no error, no sound different...nothing! Just great as it was new! I love this. I already recommended this to my sister and she likes it too. Description:

review_bold: For the price these things are great, very quiet cord, using while snowmobiling and seem fairly durable
review: Read the reviews and decided to try these out. I didn't need them and have 4 other sets of cheapo earbuds. I've been blown away by these ones.The sound quality seems to be good. I'm no audiophile and months of riding motorcycles/snowmobiles, playing in a band, etc have made me less picky about hearing the nuances of my music. That said, these seem to deliver stronger, thumpier (not like headshaking but a nice solid sound) bass than the Gummy earbuds and the iFrogz (cheapest set they make) I purchased a few months ago. The highs on the iFrogz seem to be about the same.The biggest thing I've noticed with these headphones is that the cord is way quieter than on any of the other cheap earbuds I've tried. I wore these snowmobiling and was blown away by the lack of staticy scrunching noises from brushing against my shirt/jacket liner. I personally like the 90* connector, it lets me route the cord around my kindle case then close the case so I can toss it in my backpack while riding and not have to worry as much about it getting smashed up and have tunes in the snow.I've recommended these particular earbuds to 2 friends now and will continue to do so until I find something better.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Best stereo in-ear buds on the planet for the price.
review: These in-ear earbuds truly are the best ones that exist on this planet, at this price range. No they are not the best ones that exist, but are absolutely incredible for the low price. They actually sound very good and are quite comfortable. Comfort is a huge factor with earbuds, not only sound quality. They will sound really awful if you do not have the right fit though. They come with 3 different size covers, so make sure you try all 3, in both ears, to find the best fit. If you do not get the right fit then you will not get the great sound that can be achieved with these. Yes, I said try all 3 different sizes in BOTH of your ears. Your left and right ear canal MAY actually be shaped differently. I was aware of this and I went back and forth with all three sizes to find the best fit, and best sound for me, when I first opened them. The largest size is what works best for me. These are quite amazing. If I was to point out the biggest downside of these earbuds I would have to say the isolation is a little lacking. If you don't know what that is then you probably don't really care. Bottom-line is that you should own at least one pair of these, even if you have really awesome expensive ones. These are cheap and sound amazing. Very satisfied with my purchase!

review_bold: These sound awesome, especially for the price
review: These sound awesome, especially for the price. The sound is very clean, though the bass is a little weak. I bought a pair of the Amazon Basics In-Ear Headphones at the same time to compare. The Amazon Basics Headphones are good, but the sound is not nearly as clean as these. The bass in the Amazon Basics headphones is much better, but the sound is a bit grainy and distorted in my opinion. The headphones are comfortable, and the shape of the ear buds nicely indicate which ear they go in, with out having to look at the R/L letter, a nice touch if you're putting them on in the dark. The quality of the materials these are made with feels good, but the Amazon Basics feel a bit better. However, I purchased a pair of these two months ago which still work today. I bought these because one of my kids took my old pair to use. Finally, beware of the packaging, they are hard to get into and the extra ear cushions (Small/Large) will go flying. I would buy these again.

I dont appreciate all the sound techie stuff I'm sure.....but they are way better than the ones Ive been using....and they fit great and stay in, which is a huge plus for me... review: These headphones are a fantastic value for the money. I am not an audio expert, but I do use these headphones every day, and they always deliver the same clear sound and good bass day in and day out. What is particularly good about these headphones is the design of the earpiece. I have tried several different kinds of in-ear headphones, and these are the ones that fit the best (I have small ears and this makes it difficult to find a pair that stays in my ear). Only one drawback to these headphones - they don't have a slider on the cord, but I just loop the extra one over my ear when I want to listen to only one headphone.

review: These are legit amazing.The price point is great. The durability is excellent. The comfort is unparalleled.I can't comment on the sound as compared to other earbuds because prior to buying these, I'd been unable to use earbuds for the previous two decades. Everything just _hurt_ my ear canals. I have left these in overnight, on long plane flights, and for hours of study / gaming time with absolutely no discomfort. I was even pleasantly surprised to find the medium sized buds fit my ears best, which means that somewhere, some people with even more trouble than I've had are probably throwing a party upon using the smallest size.The sound quality seems on par with the ultra-high quality, cushioned, noise-cancelling gaming headsets I've had with two exceptions:1. Bass doesn't have quite the same resonance.2. Directional sound is limited.That being said, for ten bucks, trying these was one of the best purchase decisions I've ever made.I've bought five or six pairs and everyone I've given them to has come straight back to buy them again as soon as they needed more. My SO's pair is finally beginning to fail (in terms of the connection, not the sound) after a months of daily use for 8+ hours. Last week he asked plaintively if I could find more exactly like them, which prompted a discussion of their virtues (and this review.)Try these--you won't go back.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Have Ear Phones that won't fit Your Ears?
review: Well not to be to cliche...but this is the pair for you! I want to start off by saying that most if not all other in ear conforming headphones have never stayed in my ears. With whatever I happened to be doing at the time of wearing them, they always eventually slid out, whether just casually listening, running, lifting weights, and biking, they always slid out of my ears eventually. This pair however fits..perfect. And the fit doesn't sacrifice the sound, the sound quality is great compared to a lot of other top notch crazy expensive Â£100-100 pairs of headphones. I would recommend this in a heartbeat. So if you find yourself in my situation where your ears just seem to hate every existing pair of in ear headphones, look no further, just buy these and everything will work out just right and you'll never see yourself buying another pair again...until you need to replace these, but with the cost being so low that wouldn't be much a problem when the time came anyways, would it?That is all! If you have a budget of Â£20 pounds you can buy these and still stay under budget, it's a steal.Thank you for the fantastic creation.Peace

Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.

review: What a great deal! Not only do these stay in your ear infinitely better than the ones they're replacing, but they also provide a small level of noise reduction. I use these while running and they are exactly what I was looking for. I no longer have to really crank up the sound or worry about the earbud flipping out of my ear. You do have to take one out to talk to someone or you'll catch yourself yelling at them. For this price, I might need to get some backups!

review: Still great after a month. I bought two of these for my husband and I. A month ago, the left side of my headphones started to sound a little lower than than right, but it's still great. My husband has had no issues with his. The best part about these is how great they fit my ear. I have always had issues with other headphones because of the fit. These are also great if you are working and you sweat. They rarely fall out. For the price, these definitely deserve 5 stars!!!

review: Ridiculously FAST Shipping! Amazon is the BEST! These earphones sound GREAT for the price. I brought them for my PS Vita and you can definitely tell the difference. I didn't realize the Vita had so much Bass until I put these on. It makes MLB The Show 13 feel like you're at a real baseball game, in the stadium. PS Vita must use Dolby Digital sound, or at least that's what these earphones make it sound like! Very Happy with my purchase and for the price you can't beat it!

review: These are possibly the best ear-buds I have owned. I bought these based on all the positive reviews and I'm glad I did. I am really amazed at how comfortable these are. I have always had issues finding ear-buds that fit in my ears and don't make them hurt after a while. These sit very comfortably and I'm able to wear them for hours on end. Sound quality is ok. Not for the audiophile, but it does the job for casual listening. The cord is a little short to use for a computer, so I had to buy 3.5mm extension.Pros:- Comfortable- CheapCons:- Cord is short if using for a computer- Not the greatest sound quality

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: Granddaughter is very happy she demo'ed it for me and I must say it is pretty cool!!!

review: These little guys sound great. All the people complaining about 'tinny' sound don't understand the concept of speakers and sound. These are 9mm drivers, what do you expect! Maybe if you were listening to you surround sound at home with a powered 12" woofer, sure they sound tinny compared to that. For what they are they sound great, they fit perfectly and sound great. The only complaint I have is the wire noise, a little too much, but just crank up the volume.

review: These headphones are amazing. As someone who likes to listen to music while going for a run, I've struggled to find a good pair of headphones that don't fall out easily. However, I think I finally think I've found what I've been looking for. After a quick test, these headphones had good sound quality, felt snug and comfortable in my ears, and for an extremely low price. My favorite thing about these headphones was that the 3.5mm input has an L shape instead of a straight I shape which helps reduce the chances of them becoming ruined. If you need a inexpensive pair of reliable headphones, then definitely check out these.

review: Why? Because I have been paying Â£100 every month or so from a warehouse store that will remain unnamed to buy so-so ear buds. When I put these in my ears, I was shocked at how good the sound quality is, especially the bass. I'm not an audiophile and certainly an audio snob can detect the intricacies of sound that these lack, but to me, they just sound great. I'd expect sound like this from earbuds in the Â£100 to Â£100 range. On top of that, when inserted into the ear properly, they reduce the outside noise. You simply can't go wrong, even if you use these as a backup. Even if they break after a few months.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are my favorite earbuds by far, and, for the price, there is absolutely no way not to get these. It may seem like I'm exaggerating, but I'm not... While I'm certainly not a audiophile, I do enjoy listening to all types of music, videos, and movies. When I typically cheap buy earphones, I am expecting a horrible bass, low-volume sound. However, these earbuds provide a nice crisp sound, with an above average bass and large sound range. They knock the competition out of the water, and can easily compete with Â£100 earphones. For example, I recently bought a pair of APIE Â£20 earphones on Amazon. I was so excited to actually get them, but when I actually started using them, I realized that the sound quality (and even the packaging/durability) of the earbuds was nowhere near that of these earphones. I have bought 5-6 of these earbuds and will continue to buy them in the future. It is almost unbelievable how good they are. Overall, these things sound great, fit in my ear comfortably, they stay in my ear pretty good, even when I am at the gym, and are very durable.If you need ear buds... get these. If you don't need ear buds get them. Hell, if you don't like them you are only out Â£10. With almost two-thousand 5 star reviews, including this one, it's a pretty good sign that these are in fact good buds. If you don't buy these it's a pretty good sign that you are in fact an idiot.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

Key Features:

Exceptional Sound Quality: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied audio experience with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones are engineered to provide high-quality sound across all genres of music, podcasts, and calls.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Ergonomically crafted to fit comfortably in your ears, these earphones come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit for all users. The lightweight design ensures long-lasting comfort, even during extended use.
Durable Design: Constructed with premium materials, these earphones are built to withstand daily wear and tear. The tangle-free cable and robust construction ensure longevity, while the sleek Black and Green design adds a modern touch to your style.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review_bold: am shocked at how good these little earphones are
review: Okay, have had & still have Klipsch speakers (bought during a time that no self-respecting Baby Boomer would be caught dead with any other brand name), have Bose speakers, Polk Surround Sound (all parts manufactured in Japan & not China or God knows where else, had Polk Audio on first computer, have Beats Audio in Dodge Charger, & have had KOSS earphones during the time when KOSS was only brand certain people would have.That being said, for the PRICE, am shocked at how good these little earphones are!Had forgotten I had previously bought two pair, but after the death of Errol Brown of Hot Chocolate, wanted to hear my favorite song on YouTube, ?Everyone is a Winner? on my laptop, though I?ve not used them with my smart phone or IPAD--yet.Am going to order four more pair ? one as a gift, & the others for ME. In case I lose a pair, then won?t feel like committing suicide because of overpaying for something that I can easily misplace or lose.The device of the gadget does control the volume.

review_bold: Great for everyday listening, good sound blocking ability and durable!
review: I made the switch to these after my earbuds finally gave up the ghost.After doing a lot of research I decided to get these. I wanted good sound quality but since I'm not an audiophile I didn't want to spend a ton of money.I wear these every day on the subway here in NYC listening to either podcasts or music. I was very impressed with the sound quality and even more so with the noise blocking capabilities, which on a noisy train can be very important.I've had these for about a year. About 6 months ago I dropped them into a can of paint by accident (clutz) and was really sad about it...but they still worked!I was able to clean the paint out of them (it was really in there) with a damp q-tip. It took me a while but thats how much I love these headphones. I would have bought another pair, but what can I say I'm a cheapskate.If you're thinking about buying a pair, just do it. The best you'll get for the price.

review: Ok. I beat the crap out of my headphones. I know it. I admit it. I deal with it by never paying more than $15 per pair. These have lasted as long as any pair I have ever had and longer than most. Sound quality is again on par or better than any other I have tried. I live in the city and am completely surrounded by noise all the time, which is why I'm not overly concerned with "ultimate sound quality", but was impressed with how much of the outside noise they keep out on the street and on the subway.The form is a little odd but I think the design is to add better base response, and I think it works. I can see where they might not fit well in some people's ears, so just be aware, but I find them extremely comfortable.I don't remember which review I saw it in but the sound does not come out of the weird little side part. I will most likely buy another pair when (if?) I end up destroying these.

review_bold: Hit the 'Add to Cart' button now!
review: I have bought sooooo many pairs of crap headphones at this price...but no more! These are the best headphones you can buy under 10 bucks. No doubt about it. They block out sound and have decent (but not overpowering) low end. Multiple sizes of pads make for a great almost custom fit. Like I said, they block out a good chunk of noise for a headphone at this price. They will make your breathing seem louder during heavy workouts, but they don't fall out of the ear and now you don't have to listen to that dude grunting every time he picks up a freekin dumbbell. Sound, fit, and price aside, one of the coolest features is a little bump of plastic on the left ear. This is there so you don't have to look at what ear each bud goes into. I know many headphones have this, but c'mon, we could have used that tech decades ago! Buy and be happy you found the best headphone under 10 bucks.

review_bold: Solid fit, great sound, great price.
review: I must have weird ear canals, because for years I was resigned to the idea that I just couldn't use earbuds. The old school, one-size hard plastic kind just never fit properly in my ears, were uncomfortable, and were constantly falling out.Times have changed, and I'm thrilled to find that these fit and work great. These fit more like earplugs, sitting snugly in the ear canal. They come with three different sizes of molded plugs to accommodate different sized ears. I wear them at the gym for extended periods and have had no issues with them becoming uncomfortable, coming loose, or falling out.I'm a musician and audio hobbyist, and have been very pleased with the sound quality. I wouldn't likely use them for critical listening, but for travel or the gym they sound great. And when (not if) I misplace them, they're cheap enough I can just pick up another pear.

review_bold: WOW - You will love the sound!
review: I have had a few ear buds. The included earphones with my Creative Zen, JVC, Big Lots no name, and Creative brand for about $28 ( the most expensive of the group ). I also have over the ear, full size GRADO made in USA headphones for serious listening on better quality home stereo components.These easily blow all of the lesser (including the $28 Creative) earphones away. They are not GRADOS, but for less than $10 they sound very, very good.The cord is rather simple and fragile looking. AHHHHHHHHH the sound. Beautiful, full , great vocals, great strings, and solid bass.They come with three pairs of foam pads. Please use the largest size that allows you to insert the bud fully into the ear canal. This will help isolate outside noise and also seal in that bass wave ---- yeah!If you are looking for inexpensive, GREAT sounding earphones, buy these. May God bless.

review_bold: Best Wired Ear Buds on the Market
review: I love these ear buds. The first time I bought them, I wasn't used to how big they were and they kind of hurt my ears, but I completely adapted within about a week or two. Ever since then, these are the only wired ear buds I will buy. These are the first buds I have ever found that last a long time before breaking. I've purchased about three pairs in the last two years and every time it has been because I have lost them, they have never just given out on me. The buds also do a great job of blocking out sounds from around you (they aren't noise cancelling, but the rubber buds fit to your ear to make a barrier to sound.) I truly love these ear buds more than any other I have found, and they are super inexpensive. (This isn't a get what you pay for scenario, I really think these buds are top of the line and just happen to be inexpensive). Highly recommended.

review: Perhaps it is because I'm used to the ill-fitting, sad-sounding excuses for earbuds that come standard with you-know-which-fruit-monikered-phone that these particular earbuds sound absolutely fantastic. I cannot believe how well they fit, how comfortable and secure they are, and how incredibly good the sound is considering the price. The offset tragus-secured design is perfect. I have never experienced earbuds that didn't slip out with the slightest movement. I wasn't expecting much in the way of sound, but I was totally blown away by the clarity and range. I tend to be rough on my earbuds/headphones, so I was hesitant to invest in a pair over $20. Luckily, I gave these a try first. For under $10, these are comfortable enough to wear for long periods of time AND have impressive sound for the price. I'll definitely be purchasing an extra pair or three.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

Key Features:

Exceptional Sound Quality: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied audio experience with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones are engineered to provide high-quality sound across all genres of music, podcasts, and calls.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Ergonomically crafted to fit comfortably in your ears, these earphones come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit for all users. The lightweight design ensures long-lasting comfort, even during extended use.
Durable Design: Constructed with premium materials, these earphones are built to withstand daily wear and tear. The tangle-free cable and robust construction ensure longevity, while the sleek Black and Green design adds a modern touch to your style.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review_bold: Good first introduction to in-ear headphones
review: Never bought in-ear headphones of this type before, as I always opted for the more round "earbud" style. These are very comfortable and produce great sound once you've got them in just right, especially for the price. They seem to be shaped a little differently than traditional in-ear headphones, but they sit naturally and aren't uncomfortable during extended listening sessions. Also, it's worth noting that I have tiny ear canals, but the smallest silicone pads (this comes with three sizes) fit nicely. I'll definitely grab a spare pair, but so far they've given me no problems during the last six months.

Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review: I have had these for 3 months. They have withstood all sorts of abuse, and sound as good as the day I got them! Which is pretty good!- Good sound quality. Good bass.- They stay securely in my ears. They are also very comfortable. Other earbuds fall out and/or hurt, I can wear these for hours with ease.- They block just enough outside noise that you can listen to your music in peace, but they aren't absolutely noise canceling so you are able to have some awareness of your surroundings.- I have sweated all over these, even washed them, with no damage to them!These are by far the best earbuds I have ever used.

review_bold: Best inexpensive earbuds I've owned so far.
review: I would buy any brand of cheap earbuds, but they would fray before I'd finish using them.Then I would exclusively buy Gummy brand because the sound quality was no different, but the rubber sheath covering the cord would last much longer.Then the last Gummy gave out after a year or so and someone somewhere on the internet suggested these earbuds.The difference in sound quality is amazing! I didn't realize I'd been listening to poor quality sound for years until I bought this last month. They are a couple dollars more than the Gummy and they are worth it.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

Key Features:

Exceptional Sound Quality: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied audio experience with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones are engineered to provide high-quality sound across all genres of music, podcasts, and calls.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Ergonomically crafted to fit comfortably in your ears, these earphones come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit for all users. The lightweight design ensures long-lasting comfort, even during extended use.
Durable Design: Constructed with premium materials, these earphones are built to withstand daily wear and tear. The tangle-free cable and robust construction ensure longevity, while the sleek Black and Green design adds a modern touch to your style.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review_bold: ... messing up in the beginning but now they are fine. The quality of these are kinda bad
review: Mines kept messing up in the beginning but now they are fine. The quality of these are kinda bad. They feel cheap but then again they are cheap. The sound quality is great but you have to have them well in your ears

review: I have problems finding ear buds that fit my ears, but these are great. I am not necessarily a great judge of sound, but they sound OK to me. And they don't fall out of my ears or have to be jammed into them.

review: I LOVE THESE HEADPHONES! Can't believe they are this cheap! Awesome bass for how small they are, and when combined with the fact that they are "in-ear", they block out most ALL outside noise and sound great!

review_bold: Believe the hype - these are fantastic!
review: Outstanding value and exceptional sound quality, especially for less than $10!I saw the reviews at the wirecutter, head-fi, and on CNET.I'm not going to tell you anything new, that these reviews haven't already said except that the wirecutter supposedly has a new champ in the under $10 catagory; which are the Brainwavz Delta IEM Earphones.I haven't heard the Brainwavz Delta yet, but i have ordered a pair and I will be comparing them for myself.I found these to be very comfortable with the included silicone tips. These are lightweight and don"t fall out of my ears. The slight angle of the drivers into the ear canal is neat, these are the first in-ear-monitors that I've had with this design.if that is appealing to you.I would not hesitate to recommend these in-ear-monitors to anyone. The sound quality is spectacular and you can easily afford to take these anywhere and not worry about damaging them or losing them because you can get another pair for less than $10. These are a no brainer.

review_bold: The only brand of headphones I like!
review: I adore headphones! I've bought a few different pairs in the past (usually the ones that were the most on sale). These were my most recent purchase! I love them! They fit great in my ears. I've used them for listening to music on my cell as well as on my MP3 players and computers!I've splurged on Apple headphones and even Skull Candy ones. However, when they go bad (they always do) I find myself going back to ! I love these and they do the job just as well if not better than the other, more expensive brands!!Plus the colors are so darn cute!! :D

review_bold: yet so good. Besides my expensive Sennheisers
review: It's so cheap, yet so good. Besides my expensive Sennheisers, these have last quite awhile. I don't work out or anything in them, but just keep them in my tablet bag and they provide great sound for the price.

review_bold: Just buy them-- they are fantastic for the price!
review: No crap; just facts. YES!I have some of the best earplugs, and some of the best on-ear and over-ear headphones available. So I think my opinion of these "cheap" in-ear "plugs" have some weight. One: they sound damn good for a set under $10 (what I paid)! I bought two pair of these while they were on sale. And I am glad I did!They don't cover the entire bass frequency, but they a very job at it. The mids are where they should be, which gives the listener a good feeling about what they are listening to.I played several songs in a range that tests headphones well. Here's some of what I used to test these beautiful plugs: Blake Shelton's, "Footloose"; "Sunday Morning"--Maroon 5; "The Wonders", "Doing That Thing You Do". And I've also played some Beatles songs and Nat Kind Cole, and a wide variety of genres, including Jazz. These plugs are fantastic for the price. If someone complains about it, it is probably because they don't know how to place them correctly in their ears. I love these!

review_bold: this one was pretty neat. Though it doesn't produce heavy Bass
review: It's probably my 4th time buying this Pan. 120K (I keep losing my earbuds often). It's definitely an underrated earbud in the market with a little price. Produces a decent bass and with high volume, you'll still hear stable and jitter free clear music. I once bought this as a quick alternative for my Sony earplug. And to my surprise, this one was pretty neat. Though it doesn't produce heavy Bass, which many wanna have, it impressed me with it's precise sound quality. voice cancelling - very good. Stays in ear, even while lying/ leaning on side over pillow- no issues! I never use it during workout & sport, so I don't know about that performance!I still do have Sony head phones & In-ear phones (due to it's awesome sound quality, heavy Bass, and crystal clear sound distribution. also not a big fan of Sennheisser, Bose or another top brands for their flat sound to that price), but for a very light and comfy experience, I love to have these earbuds. It's a no nonsense best earbud, offers lot more than it's price.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

review: I own a set of JVC marshmallow earbuds that I accidentally put in the washer/dryer, so I decided to give these a try. Best decision ever. The large sized buds fit in my ear perfectly, and they stay in place whenever I run, even at a moderately fast pace. I haven't tried sprinting in them, but I just got my Tuneband armband for the iPhone 4 so maybe I'll update when it gets warmer outside.I think these are better than the JVC marshmallow earbuds because they have a better fit, at least for me. The JVCs have a really hard memory foam that gets the noise isolation done but not as well as these! Also, the buds are off-center for these ones and a bit anterior to the rest of the plastic, which means it's easier to distinguish between left and right earbuds (as opposed to the JVCs where the left one has a braille dot on the back).I recommend this product if you're just looking for something stable to run in and that won't fall out of your ears (the JVCs tend to do that once you get past a certain pace). Love 'em.

review_bold: Why should you buy these earbuds?
review: Most amazing earbuds I've ever owned, I love them more than my N-Tunes and Beats by Dre Earbuds.The bass is superb and delivers great, clean ,and crisp sound quality.I have looked for a very long time for a cost effective and genuine product which I could listen to my music while skating, and on my way to school. And I have finally found them.If you buy a pair of in-ear headphones... Think about whether it would be worth it to buy an expensive pair of Beats headphones with a fairly good sound quality with way too much bass, which distracts from the mids and highs of a song, or what ever it is you're listening to... While you can get these earbuds for a fair price, and not have to worry about loosing a ton of hard earned cash or bad sound quality.These are affordable, comfortable, and effective in delivering great sound quality. These did a amazing job with theses. This is a great product and i personally recommend theses to everyone i know, in search for new earbuds or in-ear headphones.

review_bold: Almost as good as my $150 Beats headphones
review: I have to say that I love these headphones. I can seriously confirm that these are almost, and I mean slightly, as good as my Dr. Dre ear buds. The trick of any ear buds is to put the biggest ear buds on so that it opens up the ear canal, so the result is a rich bass sound. I've been playing around with my hiphop music, to see if it captures that sound, and it succeeds. For the money this is an excellent, excellent purchase. The cheapness is obviously in the wires, as they are thin. The more expensive ear buds are thicker and longer. This is just about 3 feet long so you are on a short tether. Other than that, the sound is there, and I couldn't be more happier with the risk I took on the cheapest pair of headphones I bought in a long time. I've lost two - Yes - two Beats earbuds. That's $300 down the drain. I'm going to use these when I commute, and keep my last remaining Dr Dres for home use. I won't feel the pain as much if I lose these! Perhaps its best to buy two of them.

review: I purchased these after reading the great review on businessinsider.com, and am blown away by the sound on these! These earbuds punch way above their weight class. Plugged them into my Ipad mini, and played a variety of musical genres thru them, and am very impressed by the tight sound across the spectrum. The bass is solid, but not too overbearing, the mids are clear, especially vocals, and highs are very defined. Cymbal hits ring out as if you are right at the venue! I put these up against some Skullcandy earbuds that I paid 19.99 for, and they far outperformed them. Am going to get another pair of these just in case these decided to discontinue these things (which I doubt). Comes with three sets of earbud pads (small, medium and large) to accommodate all ear canal sizes. The design looks to be sturdy, hope that they will last a good while. In summary, these are a great value, and sonically, are pure gold, will be hard pressed to find anything in this price range that even sounds remotely as good as these earbuds.

review_bold: I don't like dropping to much coin on headphones cause it seams ...
review: Just got mine today and I've got to say I'm impressed! Very impressed! I don't like dropping to much coin on headphones cause it seams I either loose them or accidentally run them through the washer & dryer which usually ruins them. Anyway they sound great! 100 times better the the $10 specials I was buying at the local drug store. I haven't truly tried them in a noisy environment but I did slam the cupboard doors around a bit and I have no doubts they'll perform well at blocking outside noise without having to wear a set of ear muffs over them. I do wish the cord was about a foot longer but it's not really any shorter than others in the same category. Really I think other than the shape of the driver being a little weird (it's shape makes you fiddle with them a bit to place them in your ears) my only complaint is if I do loose or destroy them I've got to wait to have another pair shipped to me. That being said they're cheap enough that ordering two or three at a time isn't going to break you...

In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review_bold: These headphones are unreal, BUY THEM. NO QUESTIONS.
review: I've gone through an unnecessary amount of headphones. Some expensive, most cheap, but these headphones are amazing. I got them for a mere $10, and they are worth so much more. The sound quality is unmatchable for headphones of this price range and even $10-$20 headphones. at least, of the ones I've tried. I bought JLAB headphones for a little more than these headphones, and they sucked. These headphones may not look all futuristic or feel as good as beats (they're quite plastic) but they sound amazing. The buds are comfortable and they don't seem to fall out the ear. Plus the construction of the headphones lets you easily differentiate left and right. Also, this could be a good or a bad thing, but these things TOTALLY cancel sound. People can still hear your music if it's too loud, but you can't hear ANYTHING after a certain point. These headphones are seriously awesome, stop searching and buy these.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

Key Features:

Exceptional Sound Quality: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied audio experience with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones are engineered to provide high-quality sound across all genres of music, podcasts, and calls.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Ergonomically crafted to fit comfortably in your ears, these earphones come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit for all users. The lightweight design ensures long-lasting comfort, even during extended use.
Durable Design: Constructed with premium materials, these earphones are built to withstand daily wear and tear. The tangle-free cable and robust construction ensure longevity, while the sleek Black and Green design adds a modern touch to your style.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review: I was shocked when I first got these. They were recommended to me by a friend who thought they were decent for the price. They are so much better than my $100 (ten times the price) Monster Ncredible Nergy earbuds, I almost threw the Monster's away. I swam with these in my pocket and washed them a couple of times, and they still work. I bought them almost two years ago, and use them almost all day at work, and while exercising, and they feel like there is nothing there. The bass is really great if you push them in a little bit. The sound is not as good as some expensive over the ear headphones, but these things are just six bucks, not $200! My ears get very sweaty while running, and these are the only earbuds I've had that will stay in. I finally am buying a couple more as the cord does get permanently twisted quite bad if you wrap it up in your pocket all the time which I do (I know I shouldn't), and I also have pretty much destroyed them. Recommended to all my friends and coworkers.

review: Just got these babies today and I am very impressed. Nice low-end, balanced mids, and articulate highs make these sound way better than the price tag would indicate. A little EQing and these headphoness really shine. Due to the ease and unpredictably with which wiring goes bad, portable headphones should be a minimal investment for all but the wealthy (who I assume are more concerned with fashion statements than value). I have been a loyal user of JVC's Marshmallow line for years, but unfortunately a recent redesigned left the newest model unforgivably sibilant (a sound issue where "S" sounds are too pronounced and unpleasant) . Searching for a substitute, I come across these bestsellers on Amazon and am very glad I gave 'em a shot. At less than $10 a pair, these are a steal and, assuming they hold up for any length of time, one of the best values in audio.

review_bold: The price point of these earbuds is amazing. it doesn't hurt your wallet if you lose ...
review: The purpose of the product is to listen to any type of media via headphone jack.Pros:Inexpensive. The price point of these earbuds is amazing. it doesn't hurt your wallet if you lose them.Great quality for the price. Keep in mind these earbuds aren't for audiophiles or are they hundreds of dollars. However, they produce some quality sound for the price.Minimal sound leak. I travel on the train frequently and like to listen to my music a little louder than normal. I'm always concerned with bothering my fellow train riders. Because they fit into your ear and secure with the silicone tips, there's virtually no sound leak.Extra ear tips!! They come with replacement ear tips. You are able to size the right fit to your ear or just swap them out when they get a little bit sweaty or ...waxy.Cons:These things are $10 what can you complain about? The packaging hard to open up?Value for money?These earbuds are a great value for the money. I've already purchased more because I tend to lose them often.

review_bold: Insanely good for the price, and I've bought a looot of systems.
review: I record music, do film scoring, etc etc -I use a set of Adam S2As, have numerous open back headphones (eh HD600 , Grado's etc).I've had custom molded earbuds made, bought Bose, many others.THESE are the most insane deal available, hands down!Good fit, dirt cheap, simple, comfortable. Detailed highs (very slightly 'crisp', but OK).Bass - the most helpful negative review commented that these lack bass. I believe he had fit issues.If you use the earbud pads that are too small for your ears, you'll get weak bass with most earbuds.Be sure to test for a tight / snug fit and you'll get very good bass.Also be sure to pull gently up and back on the top of your ear (reach across the top of your head with opposite hand). Then insert the earbud, and release the upward pull. Snug fit, good bass!Anyway, I bought four pairs of these after receiving the first set.
