review: I will make this short and to the point. I am and Audiophile for well over 30 years, and I was skeptical, when I read the reviews. They were so cheap, I figured, what the hey. Got them, broke them in 30 hours, make sure they were well sealed, VERY Important, take time to fit them so they are sealed good.Then I could not believe the sound from these little bastards!! I thought, this cant be! This sound from these ear buds for $30.00 dollars. I have a pair of Grado 125 headphones, which I love. Now I am not going to tell you they sound better, but I will tell you they are close, and I am shocked.Now for the bad news. Looks cheaply made cord, and connectors, be careful, and you should not have and issue with them. I use them for my ipod 5th, and have not had a problem, but just treat them carefully. Other than that, order one, and you wont regret a thing!! I give them my highest recommendation, and that don't happen much. 6 stars.Only thing, I wonder what these will due for and Encore!!

review_bold: Like your fav pair of cheap sunglasses... but headphones.
review: Ownership: 1 week.These are really great for the money. I am musician and have listened to and owned products that cost 100+ and these... won't beat them. But, they do sound pretty darn good for the price. I would say they compete for just listening enjoyment with earbuds costing 30-40 bucks. They are very comfortable too. No bells and whistles like audio controls and they won't stand up to abuse, but if you use them casually at your computer at work like I do... they please. They make a good seal for bass reproduction and I had a few "a-ha" moments where I heard subtle recording flourishes and soft background instrumentation that you wouldn't catch otherwise.Bottom line: if you are considering $10 earplugs than you arn't looking for audiophile products... these do the job well and are comfortable and light. If they last 1 year I would buy again at this price. If you lose stuff a lot, these may be your jam.

review: one of the best head phones i bought for under $100. it sounds great compared to other cheap headphones and it doesnt sound cheap either compared to ones i bought for 10x the price. don't agree? only one way to know for sure right? consumers tend to think price is correlated with quality. it does but only to certain extent. i follow the big names that has make thousands of different product than a small name that has made only one product and overprice the heck out of it. big name companies will sell products for less to bring their products to the masses as not only a way to advertise their company name but also test the market for viability in that sector. sometimes they have new engineering recruits and just make the products just to see how their new engineer recruit will cut it in making simple everyday consumer goods and market it. as i said, it doesn't have to be expensive to be good build.

review_bold: Far better than the price indicates!
review: Ok, so I have never reviewed anything on amazon before but I had to speak up about these. This is one of the enomolies to the "You get what you pay for" rule.GET THEM! These are hands down the best ear buds I have personally ever owned. And I can't believe how cheap they are. The sound is fantastic. On a loud, busy, city bus I can't hear anything but the music I'm listening to and it's crystal clear. And for those who say they don't have bass or shotty, tinny sounds clearly have no idea what an equalizer is. Google it. They fit very comfortably in ear.Long story short, I bought a pair for myself back in May and was blown away. Then bought a pair for my girlfriend and she was blown away. I just ordered a third pair for my roommate because he lost his current ones and i have no doubt he'll be blown away. For $10, don't second guess. Just buy them! They are worth far more then that price.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: To start off, i have been running cheap earbuds for a while; i seem to find random sets floating everywhere inside my house. I used to collect them to have a backup in case a set breaks. Which it always did. I ended up with about 4 or 5 'earbud" by the end and couldn't find another pair in the garage or around the house.So i went onto amazon and looked up cheap but quality earbuds, myself not wanting to spend more than Â£10 on them. I came across these and was interested by their form, price, and manufacturer. I know this brand makes quality items so I went along with the purchase and got shipped a well made product.Let ne say that I've had these earbuds for over two months so I've had time to assess them against others and, let me tell you, these are far better than many, if not most of, higher priced items. The bass is great and any song, be it heavy metal, jazz, slow moving, rap, pop, hip-hop you name it, it sounds great!Pros:*Great sound*Lightweight*Comes with extra earpieces of different sizes*Great shape and comfort*Very reputable manufacturer*Don't let much sound out (no worries for nearby passengers on plane flights)*Comes with an L-jack not a flimsy straight jackCons:Nothing major really, just me being really picky:*Cord can tangle(but gets undone very easily)*Mine have a crack in the plastic(don't worry; I'm brutal with my headphones, and the crack is very minor)That's about it, if you're on the edge, go for it. It's only Â£10; if you don't like it, it's no big deal, but I'm sure you will.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Why did I ever get anything more expensive than this?
review: Well, I don't usually spend Â£105 on headphones, but I bought a pair of Soul by Ludacris sl49's right after Christmas because I had Â£105 in Christmas money. Well, I loved em until they shorted out on me after a couple months, probably due to it going in the car for about 2 hours with the end of the cord caught in the door and repeatedly hitting the outside of the car, and then later dropping them in some water. Well I started looking for cheap earbuds on here and came across these. They cost only Â£10, so I thought I'll give em a try. Man am I so glad I did. These, to me sound almost as good as the Souls and fit a lot more comfortably than the Souls did. I saw several reviews stating that these had absolutely no bass and sounded very tinny as a result. After listening to these I am wondering if it is possible they got fakes or something because the bass in the ones I got is pretty dang powerful for such cheap headphones. If you are looking for cheap headphones that don't sacrifice much in the sound quality department, these are the ones for you! I love em! I really hope they last me awhile but even if they go out after 3 months like most of my earbuds have, I can just get another pair since they are so cheap.

Description:

review_bold: A new benchmark in this product category
review: This product sets a new benchmark for reward/cost ratio in this product category where I feel there's a lot of miss-pricing and over-charge and fantastic claims that I have tried many times and can say that most products do not deliver. Hence my 5 stars. I have the original Apple ear-buds, the new ear-pods, Microsoft Zune's ear-buds (both regular and the premium version) [all in the 25-50 USD range], Philips SHE-9850 which at the time was mid - 80 USD, and the Ultimate Ears Triple-Fi 10, that fluctuates regularly between 200 and 400 USD. All in all I think these are much better than Apple's original ear-buds and the new improved ear-pods, which are absolutely horrible in the bass, but excel at everything else and comparable to the Zune regular and premium, if not better for the way they fit my ears. They are slightly below the Philips, which has a crisper sound and slightly but noticeable better bass. Again, for the price this is an excellent product comparable to the 30-50 USD crowd, one you can wear at the gym or regular commute without worrying if it will break. The quality of built seems good, certainly not excellent, but again for 5-Â£10 I got two of them and they should last me well.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: It has a great sound, perfect size to take places, and the bass is great! I would recommend this speaker to anyone.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: Simple headphones, simple review.These work well. They fit nicely in my ears (none of the discomfort I've experienced with other earbuds, which seem to lodge weirdly). They have nice padding on the end (almost like cushions), which makes it pretty pleasant in the ear.The sounds is nice; I don't have much of a metric against which to compare the sound, but it works for listening to general music.As far as I can tell so far these are durable; I haven't had issues with shredding or tearing at the seams as I've had with Apple earbuds.They look pretty good also; they hide away in your ears so they're not super obvious. The cushion-like pads on the end can be easily cleaned; the speakers themselves won't get dirty (as with Apple earbuds).Simply put, these are a great deal. You can't get this kind of quality at this price elsewhere. You can multiply the price by 10 but I'm sure you won't get 10x the sound quality.All in all, these work well and I'm satisfied.

review_bold: Last over a month, Heavy daily use, Buying a new pair now love, Love, LOVE THEM!
review: Really good head phones for the money. I would have been happy with the product if I had paid anything less than Â£20. Much better sound quality than other inexpensive head phones I have owned. Most headphones fit me well ( I know i'm lucky) but these fit especially well. They are very comfortable. I will be buying this item again in the future. Very happy.Note: make sure you put them in the appropriate ear, Its easy to mix them up and they start to bother your ears if they are backwards.Update: Still extremely happy. I abuse my headphones, usually by now I would have had to replace them but these are still going strong a months in. (used daily for a months, Countless hours in my pocket/backpack).Update: (1 month after purchase) These lasted almost exactly a month, I've never had a pair of headphones last more than 3 months so I am more than happy with these. I use them for hours on end every single day. Finally the Aux jack stopped working cause I sat on it while plugged into my phone ( i did this like 100 times and finally it bent) I am buying my second pair right now and cant say enough good things about these headphones. Great sound, fit well, and LASTS FOR EVER!

review: These headphones surprised me when I received them back last week. The sound quality and durability is second to none. To elaborate a bit this is a product that cost less than Â£10 but operates like its cost is a thousand times more. As far as durability is concerned, I had it on my lap one day in the car. While on my way to the gym, I stopped by the grocery store and did not realized that I had dropped them, came back, drove away and realized at the gym that I had dropped them. I then went back to the same spot at the grocery store's parking and realized that it had been ran over either by me or another car. I wasn't to happy specially given the fact that I had planned on running 6 to 8 miles on the treadmill and was not planning on relying on the gym's mix of music to keep me going. I then adjusted the deformed ran over earphone with my hand and to my surprise the sound quality was still great and it ended up fitting my ears even better. That happened after I'd owned them for about a months and now fast forward to a month and they are still going strong.P.S. because I'd been training for a marathon I almost purchased a 120 doll pair of earphone prior.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

review: Truth be told, I only just received these today, and who knows, maybe they'll fizzle out fast, but that can happen with any brand, no matter how expensive they are. There's a few things I love about this product already that I wanted to share right away.1) They're ear buds. Yea yea, I know there's a lot of them, but there's more to it than that. I hate headphones, but it's the only way I've previously found to get decent sounding bass.2) They're SO comfortable in my ears. I love how the ear pieces are made, I can't even tell they're there.3) I've never had ear buds or headphones (mind you, I've gone with cheap stuff because I don't like having to spend a bunch of money on headphones and such that could turn out just as cruddy as any cheap brand out there) that have sounded so good! The sound quality is better than any regular headphones I currently own and they FAR outrank ANY other ear buds I've purchased at this price. I can't compare them to more expensive brands, sorry, but these are absolutely amazing compared to anything I've ever had. If these die out, I won't hesitate to purchase another pair, the sound is so clear and spectacular!They also arrived a day early (only took a few days), so I'm very pleased about the shipping. All in all, I have no regrets with this purchase. I may have only received them today, but I'm pleased pleased pleased!

review: :Still working great, no loss in quality. Still would absolutely recommend these. FANTASTIC value!Original review: Just got these headphones yesterday, and I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase. I was looking for an inexpensive pair of earbuds with good sound quality, and these fit my needs perfectly.I'm not sure what other reviewers were saying about the absence of bass. I've used them a lot in the past 24 hours after getting them, with a wide range of genres and can say that I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of the sound and the clarity for such an inexpensive set of earbuds. The bass is not only full-sounding, but as punchy and clear as you would expect from headphones of a much higher price point. The treble is clear and well balanced in most cases, and the mids are a little muddy, but not so much as to take away from the overall quality of the sound.I also love the shape of the actual earbuds. They fit very well in my ears (I use the medium-sized tips), and do not fall out of your ears easily due to their design, as a similarly priced set might.Overall, these earbuds are probably the best quality for the price out of any others I have tried. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a good pair of earbuds at a low price point.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These a the best ear buds I have ever owned or listened to, no question. Here are my reasons why:Sound Quality: They don't have 400 pound headphone sound, but they sound just about as good as my 130 pound headphones and better than any other ear buds I have ever heard. They fit inside your ear snugly, so they cancel out nearly all background noise and have a good bass feel.Durability: These things go through anything. I swing them around by the cord all the time (sounds weird, but it's hella fun) and they get knocked into wood, glass, concrete, etc. They've gone through the wash several times and still working great.Longevity: I've had many more expensive ear bud pairs, some around 20Â£ and some higher end ones, and they never seem to make it past about 5 or a months. I've had these for one and a half months now.Price: wow 7Â£ plus shipping is really amazing, especially for what you get.You can get ear buds that have better sound quality and bass response, better durability (maybe), but what these ear buds do is give you quality in every category, and for Â£10, to me that makes them the best.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: The best point I can make about these headphones are that they are low cost and replacable. I have a dog that really likes to chew up my headphones. I do my best at keeping my headphones out of reach, but if I make a mistake or forget then these are so cheap and sound pretty good that I don't get too upset. I just buy 5 at a time and always have a pair handy if he gets a hold of them. I have never had them break on me by any other means other than my dog chewing the ear buds off of them, but usually that seems to happen once a month. So I really can't say how well they last in the long run. The dog is still pretty young and will hopefully at some point get over these bad habits at which point I can commit to something more expensive, but in the meantime these sound great and I don't have to worry so much replacing them often. I think I am up to my tenth pair. Let that be a testament on the consistency of manufacturing for these. Not one pair out of those ten were defective.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: Sound is amazing - especially for the cost. Received the first one and bought more for gifts. They love it also. Very impressed.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: I will stop wearing these when I am dead.
review: These are my headphones. They don't break easily, they block out just enough of the outside world, the sound is good, and they're cheap enough to own several pairs so I'm not always searching for my headphones. Once I was on the bus and someone was being loud so I reached into my pocket to grab headphones and realized I was carrying 3 pairs of these with me. I love them.I never thought I would actually write a review for them, though, until last night. I put several pairs of jeans through our old, hot, not-at-all-gentle washer and drier, and when I took my pants out of the drier I realized a pair of these headphones had been left in the pocket. I almost threw them out then and there, expecting they would be totally wrecked, but I decided to see if they still worked first. They did. Just as well as before. And now they're very, very clean, too. These things are like tiny warriors. I'm a convert for life.

review_bold: Great price, good construction and sound
review: There is no reason I shouldn't throw this into the 5 star rating. Price alone makes this worth buying. Are you getting Beats by Dr. Dre?.. no you are getting a solid unit.I bought these after I lost my travel set.First the negatives:The cord quality isn't amazing. I could see this unit fray and start to short out (as so many of my buds have done). Though I have to admit I wind these around my hand and throw them into my laptop case and the cables aren't looking too bad.The sound is OK... quiet compared to others I have tried (but notice others were more expensive than this).The good:My problems with my last headset is that the ear buds kept falling out. This unit will not have that problem, in fact getting the rubber off and on is kind of a pain... but a much better pain then losing them.The price is unbeatable for what you get.I find this comfortable (again compared to similar models).You looking for a headset that works, is worth the money then you want this unit.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: These sound awesome, especially for the price
review: These sound awesome, especially for the price. The sound is very clean, though the bass is a little weak. I bought a pair of the Amazon Basics In-Ear Headphones at the same time to compare. The Amazon Basics Headphones are good, but the sound is not nearly as clean as these. The bass in the Amazon Basics headphones is much better, but the sound is a bit grainy and distorted in my opinion. The headphones are comfortable, and the shape of the ear buds nicely indicate which ear they go in, with out having to look at the R/L letter, a nice touch if you're putting them on in the dark. The quality of the materials these are made with feels good, but the Amazon Basics feel a bit better. However, I purchased a pair of these two months ago which still work today. I bought these because one of my kids took my old pair to use. Finally, beware of the packaging, they are hard to get into and the extra ear cushions (Small/Large) will go flying. I would buy these again.

Description:
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.
Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Convenient in-line controls allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, making it easy to take calls on the go.
Universal Compatibility: These earphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. The standard 3.5mm jack ensures easy connectivity to any device with a headphone port.
review: Some maniac wrote a very technical review for these, and how great they were.... I appreciate the opinion of that maniacal variety and so I bought em! It's true.... I dont appreciate all the sound techie stuff I'm sure.....but they are way better than the ones Ive been using....and they fit great and stay in, which is a huge plus for me... It is also true that they are very insulating or whatever it is that makes it dangerous to use while running, since you can't hear outside noise at all! So I do use just one ear when I'm running in traffic lest I get ran over to Bon Jovi's greatest hits! Great price too! Yay

review_bold: Great Quality for a Reasonable Price
review: These are some of the best in-ear headphones I've ever bought. I first tried them out on one of my favorite songs that I listen to often so I could easily compare them to other earbuds I have. I was honestly amazed at what I heard, it was like hearing the song for the first time, the quality was that much better. I've bought more expensive earbuds that accomplish less. The three best parts of this product are: 1) low price for great quality, I got these for about Â£10; you could probably find something superior but it would likely cost Â£100 and it would only be marginally better 2) extremely comfortable, the ergonomic design works great and I sometimes don't realize they are in my ears if music isn't on, 3) I love my music more; certain songs with a lot of base sometimes used to annoy me but they sound so much better with these headphones that I have changed my mind about those songs. When I bought these, the description didn't mention it, but they do come with the normal three sizes for the rubber part that goes in your ear, with the middle size already attached. They have worked flawlessly so far, but I've only had them for about a week, so I'll update my review if anything goes wrong later on.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These earbuds are nothing short of amazing. I bought some slightly more expensive earbuds with these, including JVCs - and these were just to be used when going out etc. as it didn't matter if I lost them. These are now the only earbuds I use - the rest can be thrown out. I was astonished with the sound these IEMs produced - they are quite sensitive and will bring out details and nuances in music that you may not have heard before - and have a nice, flat frequency response. Because of how sensitive these are, good quality music and good quality equipment (I use a FiiO x3) will make a huge difference. If there are any downfalls I've noticed, it would be that the bass is slightly laid back - (compared to the sennheisers cx 400, for example) althought still definitely present and decent - still Much more than the JVCs I ordered. I also prefer a slightly warmer sounding IEM, as these are very flat and precise, however as I said, for the price these are astonishing.

Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Runners: They stay in your ears. Hallelujah.
review: They stay in your ears!!I am a marathoner from the generation that needs music to work out. I have gone through expensive Shure buds, mid-priced Sony buds, and a bunch of others. These are, by far, my favorite choice. It's a combination of the price point and performance.The only thing I really care about is that they stay in your ears. Let's be honest, anyone who (a) wants to workout and (b) wants high performance audio really only wants (b), and wants to be seen doing (a) for short amounts of time.If you get them situated right - pull your ear back and up a little, tuck those bad boys in there - they'll stay. You may have to adjust them 2-3 over the course of 20 miles or so, but I've been pleasantly surprised by how well they stay. After 350 miles I got too much sweat in one of the buds, so I had to replace, but they're so inexpensive that I wasn't mad.To be fair, my Shure buds stayed a little better because they had foam. But when they eventually broke from water exposure, I was upset. When my first earbuds from this seller finally gave up the ghost, I raced to buy two more pairs.Free shipping. Quality performance. Low price point. Why are you still reading. Buy them.

review_bold: Amazing for the price - thank you CNET!
review: Wow. I bought these after seing the CNET review. Amazing sound for the price. I went with the biggest plugs that came with it, the base is thumping and punching right at you. Clear midrange and acceptable highs.5 stars for the price. Actual rating is 3, the overall quality brings it down. Plasticky, thin cord thats irritating all the time since it tangles easily. Would say these are gonna brake in the mext day or two if abused the mildest like pulling the cord from the ear in a fast way.Buy them for the price, since I rate the sound in the league of ~40 bucks ish. Next up would be Klipsch S4i or the E10s by soundmagic.

review: Regardless of sound quality, these r FAR and AWAY the most COMFORTABLE earbuds I've ever owned...and I've prolly gone thru 10 in the last 2 months (heavy use on train/workout/walk to work. And I also get em stolen/lost at work a ton). And as far as sound quality goes, COME ON...I'm not an audiophile, and if u are one, don't bitch bout Â£10 headphones! Its petty and irrelevant at this price point IMHO! That being said, any bass driven hip-hop/rock sounds just fine and has presence, no "tinny-ness"...Just not like your bumping to a couple 15's in the trunk! I will say the cord feels cheap, but like other users mentioned, no static like other more expensive ones...and it lasts! Comfort, to me, is just as important as sound! Another big positive as well->They just don't fall out of your ear because of the shape, no matter how long they are in for. Say what u want, but it's maybe the most annoying thing can happen while wearing earbuds!! Quality, Comfort, Convenience, and Cheap enough you should buy 2...or more!! Your Welcome :)

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: Very good fit for my ears with very good sound, but I am no audiophile. I have broken so many headphones due to my sweaty body during my run. I found that the microphone/remote is often the weak point for sweat to get in and short circuit the whole thing. This is why I looked for an simple but good headphones. So far, I am impressed with the fit and sound quality. I use the large ear piece with excellent fit. They didn't move after my sweaty run. The noise isolation was quite good for my ears. To me it sounds better than the current standard apple headphones with clearer vocals, I also have a set of Bose (SIE2i) sport headphones to compare. Bose has the best and clear vocals to my ears, but not as strong base due to not noise isolation design. I just use these for my run and my Bose for other not so sweaty exercises.In summary, these are very good sound headphones for the price and they are almost disposable if I break them.

review_bold: By FAR The Best phones Under Â£10 I have ever tried
review: wow; I have purchased many headphones; 'Dual Driver' is the way to go for ANY phones over 25Â£; others such as Soul Republic SL99; and beyer dynamics sound great but have some drawbacks for a price range over 35-99Â£;With that said I have tried ALL Kinds of phones in the 100Â£ range; so lets forget price for a moment;These are by FAR The Best phones Under Â£10 I have ever tried; They are pretty much the best I've tried Under 25Â£;Once I get into discontinued phones selling for 30Â£ that used to sell for 70-Â£100; these start to compare on that level.as with all single driver phones these may begin showing on the mid to high tones; but these are still pretty tight on the midtones at higher levels;they don't fall out of my ear; hold in the sound from background noise when inserted correctly and using the proper ear pieces given;Are pretty lightweight as well.CONS: packaging is the old 'blister style' pain in the butt to open; need a razor or strong scissors; They are Not Tangle Free

review_bold: Above average headphones for a cheap price.
review: These headphones are definitely great for the price (around Â£10 when i bought them) They have a good all around quality but the bass is a little...challenged. It isn't a problem for me because a lot of music I listen to doesn't have a prominent bass, the bass is still there, but it is not as abundant as it should be.If you are prone to losing headphones than these would be good for you because they are cheap and are of good quality. The sound quality is pretty top-notch in everything, though the bass could be better, but again, It isn't a problem.All considered I love these headphones because of the price and the quality, I would probably recommend this to anyone because of their quality and their price, if someone spends Â£10 and don't like them, it's not a big deal (I am almost certain they would like them).For a comparison, in my opinion, these are better than apple headphones. The sound is crisp and and clear (what else do you need?). They definitely get the job done.

Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These headphones are awesome. I bought the black ones for myself, the orange for my son and pink ones for my daughter.I read a review somewhere that raved about the performance to cost of these headphones, so I thought I'd give them a try. For the kids, they'd be happy using just about anything, but I am fairly picky. I figured that due to the low cost, if I am disappointed, I am not out much.Boy was I surprised. I have used "earbud" style headphones before and have just been underwhelmed with them...until now.I believe I have small ear holes and the headphones came with the medium rubber pieces put on. They sounded a bit tinny, like they were lacking bass. So, I decided to try the larger rubber pieces. HOLY COW! I am glad I tried them. So much bass! I listen to Pandora (Dance/Techno/Trance/Dubstep) on my HP laptop with Beats Audio, while I work. The bass is strong and punchy where it needs to be, but also has a lower end carry, the boom/rumble associated with bass. This is what previous "earbuds" were lacking for me.So pleased with my purchase!

review_bold: Incredible Sound Quality For The Price
review: These are fantastic! They are very cheap, yet their sound quality is actually very clear and crisp. I bought these in addition to the Â£109 Bose earphones, and although the Bose ones obviously sounded better, these Pansionic ones didn't lag behind that much in terms of sound quality. I was extremely impressed, as the sound certainly doesn't feel cheap in any way.There were earphones that I tried in the past that were over Â£100 (*ahem* Acctrend Earphones) and had worse sound quality than these cheap Pansionic ones. The reviews here praised the sound quality, but I didn't expect it to be THAT good. Here are some pros and cons:PRO'S:+Great sound dynamics, especially for the price.+Super cheap.+Come with 2 additional earbud tip pairs of many sizes.+Comfortable fit.CON'S:-The wire does get tied up.-Packaging was slightly frustrating, though nothing major.-No carrying case, but you don't need to expect a carrying case coming with Â£10 earphones.Overall, im very pleased with this purchase. Considering the fact that I got these earphones for Â£10, they're outstanding.

Description:

review_bold: Make sure the correct tips are used
review: The wire feels cheaper than some other higher-end pairs, but honestly what can you expect from a Â£10 pair? The headphones are very comfortable in my large ears and stay put during light activity. The sound quality exceeds many pairs below Â£20 I have previously tried, though at first the bass felt somewhat muddled and lazy. The other reviewer EasyTiger was not exaggerating how much the audio quality improves when the proper ear tips are used. (Make sure they form a complete seal with your ear canal.) The bass response improves drastically and the mid ranges become full and the treble ranges crisp and clear. The headphones provide excellent noise isolation as well. I purchased these as a temporary replacement for a Â£100 pair of IEMs that broke, and am pleasantly surprised with the quality. These are an excellent deal for the price.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: Surprisingly good for the price! They seem well-made, the cord does not boom too much or tangle terribly - also nice and light. As others have said, you must select the correct size of covers for your ears so that you can push these into your ear canal for proper sound. When properly seated, they stay there nicely, block out ambient noise well and sound quite good. I've only listened for an hour so they are not broken in yet, but I've noticed zero sound-fatigue - a good indicator of accurately reproduced mid-range. The upper end is gentle and moderately clear without any tinniness or harshness, almost muffled but not quite. The lows are balanced and strong without being over-bearing. I did a quick comparison with my Sennheiser HD280 Pro - over-ear cans. Compared, these erabuds sound much fuller, richer and more satisfying even though a bit less clear. I like these and am about to order a few more for back-up, travel and car.

review_bold: Presently SURPRISED!!!! A Must get for Great sound at a Great PRICE!!!
review: Truth be told i originally bought these for my wife becasue well..... She is very hard on earbuds! I did my usual research online and found the earbuds were getting some ok to decent reviews, now that being said these are going for Â£10.79 on amazon as i type this. I am a Sennheiser man to the core..... that being said i gave her my 30 pound sennheiser earbuds and took these from her!!! Very HappyPros: Of Course the Price who can Say no to Â£10, Audio Quality is amazing i find it on-par with my Â£100 pound set of Sennheiser Earbuds! Also they do come with different size buds for those of us with large or small ear canalsOnly slight Con: The this brand In-Ear Headphone is not the standard straight earbud they have a slight offset to them and that is why my wife didnt like them, I personally have no issues with it.

Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: This is the best Bluetooth potable speaker on the market. Can't beat the price. Super bass. Sound like a stereo system using my cell phone or tablet.

Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are not high end earphones and should not be treated as such, however, for the price they're a great value. Their sound is comparable with most I've tried within the 20-30 pound range, which is where most people who aren't audiophiles are going to stick. Good mids, decent highs, iffy-to-OK lows depending on content, pretty much the standard gamut for low end earphones up to the 30ish range.About the only low end earphones you're going to get at a better all around sound are the famed monoprice "Enhanced Bass Hi-Fi Noise Isolating Earphones", those have excellent sound for the money, probably up into the 50+ pound range, however they are *AGONY* to wear and will not stay in your ears, such a shame.These however, are very comfortable, which is one of my common pet peeves with earphones, either they don't stay in your ear or they're really uncomfortable and these are rather fine all around.A great deal at under ten.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These really are the best headphones I've ever used. The thing that sets these apart from all others I've tried (even ones costing over Â£100) is that they STAY IN YOUR EARS, the plastic part of the buds DO NOT FALL OFF, and they're DURABLE!! I used to have to get the earbuds that have the loop that goes around your ears in order for me to be able to run on the treadmill without having my headphones fall out, but those were hard to find and always broke after just a few weeks. But with these I never have any problems. Everyone in my family and several of my friends use them and we're all obsessed haha. I've ordered at least 10 pairs over the last few months (mostly due to misplacing them; they're very durable and don't break easily) and they quality has been consistent. Call me paranoid but I've toyed with the idea of buying a lifetime supply of these so I'd be all set in case they were ever discontinued... highly recommend!

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are inexpensive headphones, and I keep coming back to them. The way their ear is designed lets them stick in your ear better than the standard round ones. I have small ear holes, so normal ear buds not only hurt my ears, but pop out. These are small enough, and three different gel sizes, that I can use them in my ears.The sound isn't bad quality, though I know it could be better. For the price though, and particularly if you're on a budget, I can't recommend them enough.If it helps, I've spent money on the skull candy ear buds and been -very- unhappy with them. The moment I had the money to buy these guys, I did, and I'm SO happy for it. I use them when I walk to campus, home, and around campus, so they get a pretty good workout.So, in essence:-Good for small ears-Inexpensive-Decent soundCons-None that I know of, but they do seem to wear out fast.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These earbuds have great sound. And, they seem to be well-manufactured: they don't have the problem of static when you wiggle the plug end that many inexpensive earbuds have. Best of all, if your family loses these as often as mine does, you're only out a few bucks. I buy a couple of pairs before every family trip.Note that if you don't care about color, different colors are different prices, and it's not consistent at all. Sometimes, the Silver will be Â£1.50 more than the Orange, sometimes they'll be the same price, and sometimes the Silver will be less expensive. When I order, I just pick whichever's the cheapest. (Note, though, that the wire on the purple is more like lavender.)Only real downside here is that the packaging is frustrating. It's clear plastic. Luckily, it's not sealed completely around the edges, but it is still sealed enough to be a pain to get into. On a recent plane trip, it took about 15 minutes to actually destroy the packaging enough to get to the ear buds.

Description:

review_bold: Don't let the low price fool you!!!
review: Sure, these are inexpensive, but they are not CHEAP! The s replaced a pair of Sennheisers, the CX200, which I really liked, but the left bud stopped working about 2 months after warranty ran out. I think it's a loose wire, but there's no way I can fix it.With all the positive reviews, and the really low price, I had to give these a try. I bought two pair, just in case I liked them.They're as good as my Sennheisers, though because I have them in for literally 8 hours per day, my left ear gets a little sore by Thursday or so. I don't know what it is, but it's not major, just annoying.The details are nice. With the buds being angled they're easier to insert. Also, and I don't know if anyone else noticed this, but the left bud has a tiny bump on it, so you know it's the left one. Quite clever.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are incredibly good earbuds for the price. My workouts at the gym destroy earbuds in as little as two months; I've had these for three and they're going strong, so far. Because of the slightly oval shape, they fit in my ears better than any earbuds ever have--this may be a unique personal point due to the shape of my ear canal, but these never fall out when I'm running. They don't have the sound quality of more high-end models, but their sound is perfectly fine--and hey, they're less than Â£10. I'm buying another pair just to put away in case (almost inevitably) my first pair dies. My only complaint is that they don't have a clip for the cord to hold it to your shirt, which I think is a necessity when you use them for working out. Luckily, I have a few clips from far more expensive models that stopped working in the past.

Description:

review_bold: Waste your money on Â£100 headphones or buy these
review: These are qualitatively better than fancy Â£100 headphones. They're already an almost totally sound proof environment when you put them in, but combine them with Â£15 ear muffs ( such as http://amzn.com/B00CPCH86A ) for a totally sound proof experience... And feel like a genius while you're at it for saving yourself a ton of money. What's more, the earmuffs will last forever and you can guiltlessly replace the headphones whenever the speakers burn out.My experience with life expectancy of these headphones is between 9 and a months. Your mileage will vary depending on frequency of use, volume, temperature humidity and pressure where you live, tangles, throwing them down, etc etc. For the price it's great to not even have to worry about taking care of them.Buy these, love them, mourn them for 10 seconds when they die, repeat.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: This ear-bud set came with smaller and larger size earpieces that I could use, but the ones installed worked fine for me (a 6-foot woman with a proportionately slightly larger head and possibly slightly larger ear openings than shorter people, I suppose). Sound quality is clear, and sound transmission from device via the ear-buds to my ears is excellent. They don't fall out if you use them while walking and running around. Nice long extension cord, and they fit easily into the standard headphone jack on my smartphone and laptop. If you want to adjust the sound, you adjust it on the device these plug into, not on the ear-bud assembly itself (this is a cheap, simple transmission device only). Great product for the price. Now, I just hope I don't lose them. But at this price, if I do, it won't cost much to replace them. Got to my home in just one day using Amazon Prime. I'm happy.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These headphones are excellent, especially for the price. If you are like me, you like ear-bus style headphones but you lose them enough that you don't want to buy expensive ones. Well, these are excellent and for <Â£10 I will continue to buy a pair once or so a month (because I lose them.)Sound = good. Not an audiophile but the quality of sounds between these and the new iphone headphones are the same to me.look = fine. Who really cares?innovation = very good. It has a more form fitting design which means you have to put the bud labeled "R" in your right ear only and vice versa for your left (most buds, it doesn't matter which ear you place them in.) This leads to a more snug fit which I find great for working out and running. They do not pop out.for the price, its worth it to try for just about anyone.

Description:

review_bold: Awesome headphones for an amazing price
review: We go through headphones in our house like you wouldn't believe. They always manage to get lost or go through the laundry after a few months. So these headphones are a standout winner for us due to the excellent price and the durability (one pair we own has made it through the washing machine and still works!).My favorite feature about these headphones (other than their excellent price) is that they actually stay in your ears while you're exercising. For a long time my husband insisted that we only buy headphones that wrap around the ear -- he was sure no earbud-style headphones could stay in while running. But these work! I'm not sure how, but I have no problems with them falling out of my ears.Also, the sound is great -- no problems there. As long as we keep losing headphones, we'll keep buying these!

Description:

review_bold: Great headphones worth a price five times more than what you pay for them!
review: The three points I like to touch on whenever writing an online review are quality, value, and shipping. These headphones did extremely well on all three categories. The quality of these earbuds was way beyond any of my expectations. The sound was defined, outside noise was blocked out, and they fit extremely comfortably into my ears. These earbuds costed Â£10, so nobody would expect anything above average with them. However, these buds were just as good if not better then Â£100 earbuds. The shipping was amazing for these earbuds. Not only did they arrive safely to my home, but they did so a day before the earliest expected arrival. Overall these earbuds are an amazing buy. Don't read the bad reviews and think otherwise. Anywhere you go there will be people complaining about somethong.

Description:
Elevate your audio experience with the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones, available in a striking Black and Green combination. Designed for those who value both style and sound quality, these earphones are ideal for daily use, workouts, and travel.

Key Features:

Exceptional Sound Quality: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied audio experience with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones are engineered to provide high-quality sound across all genres of music, podcasts, and calls.
Comfortable and Secure Fit: Ergonomically crafted to fit comfortably in your ears, these earphones come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit for all users. The lightweight design ensures long-lasting comfort, even during extended use.
Durable Design: Constructed with premium materials, these earphones are built to withstand daily wear and tear. The tangle-free cable and robust construction ensure longevity, while the sleek Black and Green design adds a modern touch to your style.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Easily manage your music and calls with the convenient in-line controls. The integrated microphone ensures clear and crisp voice quality, making it effortless to take calls on the move.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, these earphones feature a standard 3.5mm jack for easy connectivity.
review_bold: They sound great and work well, as expected.
review: I usually use my in-ear bluetooth headphones with my smartphone but have had some audio syncing issues when trying to pair them with my PC so I got these to resolve the issue, which they have. I plan to use them as a backup pair of headphone when I travel as well because my bluetooth headphones only last about ten hours. They fit me perfectly and I have grown to love the in-ear style of headphones over the past few years. I don't see myself ever switch back to on-ear or over-ear style. The one major benifit imho is that they don't mess up your hair. I know that's kind of a silly benifit, but the little things often matter. The added benifits of sufficiently blocking out ambient noise and improving the bass by creating an air tight seal in your ears makes these well worth the low cost. I would definitely highly recommend them if you're looking for headphones that are inexpensive and that sound good.

review_bold: I can't believe how amazing these Â£10 earphones sound
review: Wow, I can't believe how amazing these Â£10 earphones sound!!! For any of you who are complaining that they don't sound good...please hook them up to a sound source that has good power or amplification.I first tried these with my HTC phone and I was totally disappointed. However, I've had other low cost headphones/earphones that sound bad when hooked up to my phone or another source that can't produce high volumes. So I hooked this up to my home stereo receiver and holy smokes! The bass is awesome and the overall sounds is very good....all for Â£10. High and mids aren't going to wow you but again, for the low price these things are truly amazing.So if you think they don't sound good with your phone...I dare you to test them out on a good stereo that can produce high volume.

Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: This is my first review ever, and I am in no way, shape or form associated with this brand or anybody else trying to secure a profit from selling this excellent product.I am an avid music listener and have probably used over 100 different kinds of headphones over the months.I've bought expensive in-ear headphones from Sony for Â£100 and they are no better than these.In my opinion, this is by far the best quality product you can get at this low price point.The bass is great, they've never stopped working on me (I lost tons of them but they never just broke), and they come in any color you want. I've probably bought around 20 pairs of these on here and never had any problems. I've told a lot of friends about these over the months and none were ever disappointed.Give them a try, I can almost guarantee that you will be pleasantly surprised by the sound quality of these headphones.

Description:

review: This item arrived much faster than expected (ty seller :D) and was of much higher quality than I anticipated. There are scores of reviews on these earbuds yet most came with an association of the price point. As such, I wasn't sure whether I was getting a good product, or merely a good product for the money. Let me clarify these earbuds are among the best on the market irrespective of cost. I own Bose earbuds and three different models of skullcandy earbuds. These outperform all four other earbuds I own. Sound is crisp and clear and doesn't distort significantly at high volumes. Audiophiles will lament that this headset doesn't have high end features and while that is true, there is no indictment against the engineering and craftsmanship placed in this set. If you are on the market for a comfortable set of well crafted earbuds that deliver exceptional sound, look no further.

Description:

review_bold: Peace and quiet from road noise
review: These buds have it all. My main concern was their ability to block out road noise (I drive a motorcycle, and I like to listen to the radio) and their form factor (I always wear my helmet, and big buds inside a small helmet do not for a comfortable ride make).One of my ear canals is narrower than the other, and the multiple sizes of silicone plugs fit my needs perfectly.Great sound quality. These buds faithfully reproduce bass tones, largely because of their excellent fit.I haven't had them for terribly long, but they appear to be of sound construction (no pun intended), because I have never had problems running them from my phone out of a zippered pocket, up my back, and into my helmet. You will be pleased with these buds.

Description:

review_bold: Best you can find for less than Â£10
review: The left side of my previous earbuds recently broke. So I was willing to pay up to about Â£100 for a good replacement pair. I read on cnet that these this brand earbuds would put out Â£20 quality for around Â£10. I was skeptical but I decided to try and be smart with my money and try these.Pros:These earbuds were around ten bucks and they sound better than some twenty pound pairs I have used. Other reviewers complained about a lack of bass but it sounds great to me. And I have had some really nice earbuds in the past. It's worth mentioning that I listen to mostly rock.Cons:These are cheap and you can tell when you hold them. The cord is exremely thin and tangle prone. The buds themselves are very plastic feeling. I don't expect these to last very long.Overall:If you need some decent sounding earbuds for a while and don't have much money, these are an excellent option.

Description:
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.
Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.

review_bold: These cheap little earphones have really surpassed my expectations. ...
review: These cheap little earphones have really surpassed my expectations. It's certainly not high resolution sound, but they also cost Â£10, and I'm very impressed with the fidelity and range of sound they produce. I use mine while running on the treadmill and while I'm commuting to work on the subway. I've had trouble with earbuds in the past that don't seem to fit in my ears, but these work perfectly. For Â£10, what do you have to lose?

Description:

review_bold: You have nothing to lose. Sound quality is excellent.
review: These headphones are cheap. Very cheap. So cheap that I was breathtaking by the stunning audio quality that they had. It blew me away.The bass is teeming and the treble is as crisp as a leaf of lettuce. What else? I've put these headphones through the washing machine three times (by accident; I never check my pockets) and they still work fine. Even one round through the scorching dryer and these babies are going hard. I'll tell you right now that more. Expensive Earbuds wouldn't have been able to handle the water because they rely on active subs to deliver sound that's equal to the ones that these produce.Buy a pair or five. It's not like you'll regret it.Only gripe is that the cord is very thin and easily gets tangled.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review_bold: Great sound, quite loud for how small it is
review: Great sound, quite loud for how small it is. The instructions are a little confusing, but with some tinkering, it's pretty easy to figure out. The light feature is a definite plus.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are some great little earbuds! Sound isolation is good and audio quality is better then expected for the low price. My music sounds very nice and I have absolutely no complaint about that. Jack is the 90-degree elbow variety, as opposed to the straight kind. Keep that in mind if you have a specific need for one type or the other. Comes with 3 different cap sizes that attach securely. I went back and forth a few times to get the right size and the caps are still tight. Nothing I hate more than losing the rubber cap on a perfectly good set of headphones! The only complaint I could have with these is that the cord is a little short. I am 5'11" and the cord barely reaches the mp3 player in my pants pocket. However, this makes for a nice little compact package when wrapped up so it is not that bad at all. I would recommend buying these all day long.

Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These headphones are amazing for the price. Surprised by their sound quality and comfort. I used to hate these kind of headphones, the ones that go inside your ear. But I gave these a shot and realized that I didn't like them before because the gummy things that go into the ear were too big causing the headphones to fall out. So I just put the smallest size they sent with the headphones on (comes with 3 pairs; small, medium and large) and they fit great. Also, its hard to see in the pictures but they're designed kind of like apple earpods where the headphone sits in your ear and the speaker part goes into the ear. Only negative thing I could think of about these is that the cords tangle pretty easily but its not a big deal if you're careful with them. Cant believe I almost bought apple headphones for 30 pounds and these are just as good if not better.

Description:

review: The earbuds arrive in a rather cheap looking package, like something you find in those 5Â£ movie bins at best buy. I could open it without a knife by using my teeth to separate the 2 pieces of plastic pressed together.Ease of opening-8The ergonomic earbuds are designed to fit snugly in your ear. It comes with a ridiculous amount of earbud sizes. The cable feels old and flimsy, like if i pull too hard or if it gets stuck in a door way. The earbuds have a smooth touch, but look OK.Appearance-7The sound quality is surprisingly good. It fits into the nook of your ear, and hooks quite well. The bass is good, and it can go pretty loud.Functionality-9Over all for the price of the product (5Â£), it is a steal.Rating-8

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: Unless you're someone whocan't stand in-ear headphones, I really can't think of any cons. They fit perfectly out of the box, and even included a larger and smaller set of tips just in case. I shook my head quite a bit trying to make them fall out and they didn't budge. These are essentially a combination of ear plugs and headphones, blocking out quite a bit of noise even when no music is playing. Speaking of music, the quality is great - they're obviously not professional DJ headphones, but the sound is crisp and clear. I'm keeping this pair on my desk at work, and I'll soon be ordering another pair for yardwork at home. One word of caution would be to start with the volume low and work your way up to the desired level, since 100% of the sound is sent directly into your inner ear.

Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: They sound incredible for the price. the first thing you need to do is remove the current rubber piece on the earbuds and install the larger rubber piece on the ear buds. This creates a tighter fit in the ear canal for some low end bass. I use these on my Ipod and set the EQ for acoustic. And these babies will rock. They sound as good as my Sennheiser ear buds that cost 7 times as much. No matter what your musical taste is, These ear buds are the best I have heard in a while. you can't go wrong with these. You can bet the next time I need another pair the hunt is over. Now I wish I would of picked up a couple more pair just in case these disappear. I have only owned them for less than 24 hours so I don't know how long they will last as I can be pretty hard on ear buds.

review: These are one of the great secrets. I read about these online last month, being called a "steal" for the sound they produce at the price. I am not an "audiophile" but have spent a good deal on higher end ear buds only to be disappointed. This includes so called "athletic" buds. I just wanted something with great sound, that was comfortable, and had the additional stem from the bottom of the bud, which keeps them in place. This is the real deal. The bonus is that at less than Â£10, they are A STEAL. I have purchased a few pairs now, because at this price, I can keep them in the car, in my gym bag, and with my devices. They are great for workouts, or watching a movie. Great sound, and very durable.

Description:

review_bold: Not just ''great for the price'' - they're great period.
review: These are the best headphones for the price. They're durable, too. I bought mine last month and they worked perfectly fine up until I lost one of the squishy things from the left one. I don't know where it went to. I looked everywhere. It wasn't like I lost it the very first time it came off though. That is my only issue with these is that the squishy things (the part that goes in your ear) came off aaaalllll the time. I was always having to dig around and find it and put it back on. They didn't just fall off while sitting undisturbed though. They would get slightly caught on something, like a blanket or my seat belt or everything else and then pop right off. I'm not even taking a star off for that because they're great headphones and I'm going to get another pair.

Description:

review: These are my favorite headphones I ever had. Whenever I run, I always listen to music. Also, I always had problems with getting the right headphones for myself without spending too much money. I tried a few different ones that weren't too expensive, and for some reason, after a certain running distance my ears would slightly hurt and feel uncomfortable. With these headphones, I don't have that problem anymore. Now, I can listen to the music while running as long as I want to. In fact, I wasn't the only one who liked them. My brother also liked them a lot so he decided to "borrow" my headphones. As he didn't want to give them back, I ordered two more for myself (just in case someone will "borrow" them again).

review_bold: Best earbuds ever for under Â£10!!
review: So after my bluetooth earbuds stopped working, I quickly set out to purchase a new pair of earbuds (because the Apple iPhone earbuds are really bad...) and found these. I must say, for only Â£10, these things are amazing. I've used earbuds before that cost me Â£20 and were total junk, but these are only Â£10 and are just amazing. They fit nicely in my ear and don't slip out, even with lots of head movement. They're also very comfortable, but wearing them for more than 45 minutes will make your ears hurt a bit. The sound quality is also top-notch as well! I can't notice anything wrong with my music when using these, but then again, I'm not much of an audiophile. The quality is good enough for me!Overall, these are THE BEST earbuds you will get for under Â£10.

Description:

review: Simply awesome. Why negative reviews even exist for these headphones is COMPLETELY beyond me! Great sound, and great bass, for sure! I can jam on with these bad boys no problem, and, they seem to handle those loud volumes with no problems at all. Off the record, whoever INVENTED the " in ear" headphones is simply a genius. So all in all - just get these things, theyre great for the price, and try not to let 1 star reviews hinder your "pricing around" decisions. Those who gave these things that kind of a review had either A. gotten a bad pair by accident from the manufacturer, for that type of thing happens ALL. THE. TIME anyway, or B. are COMPLETE morons and dont know how to PROPERLY take care of/use headphones by default, or how to put them IN their ears - the way they were MADE to be.

Description:

review: UNBELIEVABLE VALUE. If you need just a plain ol' everyday earbud, get these. Sturdy, and they sound fantastic. Once in my ears, they definitely muffle a lot of sound going on around me, and that's even before I put the music on. Oh, and they are incredibly comfortable. I've had them in my ears for hours during long commutes (on noisy public transpo) and never even a whimper from my ears. The ones Apple sends w/ the iphone KILL my ears after about 20 minutes. I can only compare it to sneakers vs. high heels for my ears. These in ear earbuds are definitely sneakers. Really great sneakers that you can't believe you found on sale.A fantastic earbud, and you're crazy if you don't buy a pair at least just to keep in your arsenal as a back up.

review_bold: They work perfectly fine. As a Â£10 pair of earbuds
review: These are my cleanest pair of earbuds at this time - my wife had just put them through the clothes washer and dryer! They work perfectly fine. As a Â£10 pair of earbuds, they are of course not as good as those earbuds that cost 10, 20 times as much. This is just to be expected. But these are good quality, very pleasant-to-listen-to earbuds. One does not get irritated with these, like the poor quality original Apple earbuds and other earbuds that come with original ( expensive) devices. My wife who has very sharp ears and cannot tolerate poor quality ear buds approved these. For exercise, on the subway., etc. these are great. For critical listening, buy the Â£100 earbuds.

Description:

review_bold: Just a 5 star review passing by that's bound to be lost in the other reviews.
review: These do what they are meant to do which is play music. At Â£10 I didn't expect that much and was amazed at how small these were compared to other earbuds. These have great sound quality and rival the sound of the iLuv'd that I had. The iLuv's were really uncomfortable ,but these are on that level. These are really small headphones and I feel like these might have the same ear pain that the iLuv's had. I can feel them slightly in my head when I put them. I kind of like this and hate this at the same time. If you like the earbuds to stay in your ear, you will like these. If you can handle a little uncomfortably than I would say to get these, but if you can't then keep searching. Even if you don't like the sound or fit, then you only wasted Â£10.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: I really like this speaker. The function and sound are excellent for the price. I love the music timer. The soft light is perfect. I love this speaker for travel ans home.

Description:
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.
Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Convenient in-line controls allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, making it easy to take calls on the go.
Universal Compatibility: These earphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. The standard 3.5mm jack ensures easy connectivity to any device with a headphone port.
review_bold: Needed a good pair of ear buds since my last one died
review: Reason: Needed a good pair of ear buds since my last one died.Product: It comes with 2 pairs of extra tips a smaller and a larger one. The medium size one that's on the ear bud itself fits rather comfortable in the ears. It's not heavily bass but the sound resonates well. You can hear the instruments, vocals and effects clearly with the right audio settings.Conclusion: You are getting a good quality ear bud at a rather cheap price.

Description:

review: YES! These are really nice ear buds. Sound quality is great (coming from a non-audiophile) and all I asked for. They are comfortable and fit perfectly for me! and probably for you too. They ship with 2 pair of interchangeable "buds" along with the ones that are already on the ear buds. They vary in sizes so it fits the hole in your ear! Wow, I need to learn all these terms, but leave a comment, if you have a question. I'll do my best to explain my ignorance. Or you can explain to me!What I'm trying to say is, for the money, these ear buds are awesome!Solid sound qualityGreat fitThey don't fall out when I'm doing moving aroundCord is adequate length in my daily useand you can't beat that price!

review: Very comfortable, fantastic sound, and exceptional quality. These were also a great value. At the time I bought these they looked good and were about Â£10. I was truly surprised when they showed up and were of exceptional quality. The rubber tips are ofset and have a funny shape. This helps it fit in the ear, but prevents it from being pushed too far into the ear. They have 3 sizes of ruber tip to choose from and fit securely in the ear without being tight. Again the rubber pieces are an odd shape which makes them more flexible while still sturdy at least so far they are.I plugged these into my computer to test them and I was so impressed I wanted to stop using my external speakers. The sound is impressive. To my untrained ears these were as good as Bose for a lot less money.
