review_bold: good buy and great value earphones.
review: Wonderful earphones for Â£10. These are replacing some cheap ear phones that came with my phone.I bought these for exercising and I am surprised that they stay in my ear relatively well. I use these for jogging, hiking, and going to the gym.Sometimes I have to readjust while jogging but they stayed in my ears better than the cheapo earphones that came with my phone.I like that these come with 3 different sizes ear tips. I use the medium or large ones. the small ones are too small for my ears, and they just fall out my ears.I have to see how longs these will last me. and I would not feel too bad if these wear our over time or break. These are cheap enough for me to buy more. I rarely like earphones, I am more of a headphones kind of guy but for exercising, these will have to do.

Description:

review_bold: Great for the price, good fit.
review: They fit very snugly in my ear, and the sounds quality is quite good. There seems to be alot more bass in these than in other headphones; so much that it almost seems to be muting the higher end, but I think I am just not used to hear this much low end, so it is tricking me a bit. For the low pince, I am pretty happy. Plus they are one of the best fits I have had in earbuds. They do go pretty deep into the ear though, so if that's uncomfortable, these may not be for you. I think they are way better than apple headphones, or similar designs that don't fit into the ear very securely.Jogging with them works very well, they stay put and don't move, and the wiring isn't so heavy that is yanks them out as you run. I will probably buy these again next time I need earbuds.

Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: There are limits to how good earbuds can sound, no matter how much you spend. I have Sennheiser and Grado over the ear headphones, and while these do not sound nearly as good as those audiophile headphones, these very inexpensive and convenient earbuds are quite listenable. There are times when you don't want to be wearing a big set of headphones and there are also times when others don't feel like hearing what you're listening to (audiophile headphones are not soundproof) or you don't feel like hearing a lot of environmental noise. As other reviewers have noted, it is important to fit them properly; once that is done they are going to give you just about the best sound available from these types of headphones. Great buy.

review: These ear buds worked flawlessly through rough times. I drummed with these, I worked out with these, carried them in my pocket and pulled them out everyday. Not only are they durable but the sound quality is superb compared to any other earbuds I have ever worn. Unfortunately yesterday was their last day. The right earbud went out. I knew it had this coming because there was a small tear in the right wire. I had this tear for about 3 months though and they still worked perfectly fine. I will still use the broken ones for hard, sweaty work situations though. I had another pair at the ready and they're working perfectly! Just need to burn them in a little bit..I would highly recommend these earbuds, especially at the extremely low price they are being sold for..

review: These earphones have to be one of the best earphones I have bought. I went through so many pairs of skullcandy like the ink and inkd 2.0, but these have really good bass for like dubstep which I like. I'm not saying skullcandy is bad, trust me the inkd earphones are actually really loud, but the music clarity of these doesn't need a really loud sound. These earphones in all have good bass, a nice sound that you won't be saying you want it louder, and they also are a good fit in your ear. They won't come off if you pull on them or when your running which is nice. They are also comfortable if you have the right size buds and have them in right.

Description:

review: These earbuds fit great and are very secure when I move around. They also do a great job of blocking outside noise. The sound quality is fine for me - I usually listen to podcasts and radio broadcasts and I'm not much of an audiophile, but as far as I'm concerned, these buds sound terrific.I wish the wires were a little thicker and not so prone to tangling when in storage, but for he price I'm not going to complain. I've ordered a second set to have in case I lose these.This is the fifth set of earbuds I've tried in search of something that would stay in place comfortably while moving around, including 2 different ear-hook styles, and these are the best by far. They're also the cheapest. Go figure.

review_bold: Nice ear buds, grat price, great quality
review: Well made and inexpensive ear buds with good soung , and cords are mode of material that stays soft and pliable instead of getting hard and cracking like many lower priced ear buds do. I and my wife use these in a setup that allows us to hear TV (steaming) through ear buds instead of speaker volume, and it is all we could ask for in quality and sound. I use a small mixer ( Beringer) coming out of the Samsung TV headphone out to split sound ad provide each of us with an adjustable sound level and personal listening of our viewing. I also use a set of these at work in order to stream music on my PC while I work. Again fine good quality sound at an affordable price.

review: Well I had the JVC Xtreme Xplosive Headphones? Had a weak connection in both side of the speakers. Second one did one one side. So? I needed something that would help replace them! Came across these "AMAZING" Earphones! I didn't expect them to be good! They are great for their price and sound quality! I don't really care about the look! But they are great earphones only nice, Clear Sound! Aren't really good for the bass Addicts. Which I am one but it's satisfying! Only thing bad about them is they tangle easy! But it doesn't bother me! I recommend these to the music lovers! Not a lot of bass in them! But it'll do! Sounds great on all types of music!

review_bold: Cant be beat for the price
review: These are amazing for the price. I cant tell you how many times I have purchased very high end ear buds only to lose them, or in one case have them chewed by my dog. I gave up and bought a bunch of cheap but high rated models. These earbuds not only have better sound than any other in their price range but they surpass ear buds that cost 2 to 3 times more than they do.- great sound- noticeable bass without distortion- comfortable fit that wont fall outI do miss having the noise canceling, inline microphone and controls as well as the superior sound offered by the Â£200+ earbud market, but at the end of the day if these get lost I can order another pair without breaking the bank and that's where these headphones take the lead.

Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Finally earphones that won't make me deaf
review: The best thing about them is that they're quieter. They need the volume at about the same level as my laptop's speakers. I don't have to keep checking the volume before putting them on, to avoid hearing damage. I need to turn my laptop's volume way up for speakers but way down for earphones. My J-Buds were painfully loud if the volume was above 33%. At 75%, we're talking permanent damage. With these, they're comfortable at 50-75%. Even at 100% it's just a little uncomfortable.The second nice thing about them is the L-shaped jack, which for laptops is what I prefer.Finally, these come with three pairs of rubber ear pieces, so you can find the right fit.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These in ear headphones are simply amazing. For less than Â£10 you cannot find anything better. Even my more expensive headphones that I replaced with these don't sound nearly as good. You can sometimes hear the rustling of the wires when you move your head around, but if you position them correctly in your ear you can minimize the sound. This would be annoying if they weren't so inexpensive and quality sounding. And with 3 caps, you'll be able to fit them comfortably. If you're looking for a back-up pair of headphones for some really high quality ones or want a pair that sound really great but can't bring yourself to spend so much money, then go with these. You won't be disappointed.

review_bold: They went through the washer and dryer...
review: There should be a bonus boost star available because I go through earbuds like NO ONES business and these are AMAZING! My the cat chews my cords so I try to pay very little for them because it's the cat who ruins them so I never buy expensive ones so I got these cheap, hoping they'd fit the bill until the cat found them. But MAJOR MAJOR MAJOR props to this pair: they went through the washer AND dryer and still work like brand new. No echo-sound, no probelms of any kind. They work like brand new. The cat still hasn't found them and they're still working BEAUTIFUL. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this pair for anyone on a budget hoping for a long-lasting set.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These headphones offer the most bang for your buck I've ever seen in a pair of earbuds - they sound like headphones 5x their cost. The fit is perfect as well - very comfortable in my ears, and seals out basically all sound (I use them as earplugs at night sometimes when I can't find my actual ear plugs). If there's any downside it's that the cable is thin and has a cheap plasticy feel to it, and it tangles pretty easily. But despite this the headphones have held up surprisingly well. I used to buy skullcandy, but these will be my default earbuds for the foreseeable future. I just wish there was a slightly more expensive variant with an inline mic/control and a better quality cable!

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Very good, and amazing for price
review: These buds are very nice. They have great sound and transmit bass well. The actually fit into the ear and each side is slightly different. There is a true right/left bud. When putting them on the canal part should be towards your face, the flatter part towards your back. They fit well and do not fall out from casual movement. They include a few different canal sizes for different sized people. These are a huge upgrade from most stock buds that come with players. You can not hear them at all when removed from ear, so you will not bug people next to you.Only down side is because of their shape and material they are a little harder to untangle.I liked them enough to buy a second set for work and home.

review: This was my first pair of earbuds. They sound great and fit well in my ears. I ran 13 miles with them in and they didn't slip or hurt. I put them through the washing machine and they still worked like new. I finally destroyed them the second time I put them through the dryer...I didn't realize how much better these were until I tried to replace them. I've tried three other sets. A cheap no name brand, no surprise it was crap, a Phillips set for sports that hurt and fit poorly, and skullcandy fits, which stay in my ear, but don't seal the ear canal like these do and the silicone comes off too easily - already lost.Second set of these is on the way now, should have stuck with them in the first place...

review: They do what they are made to do. The sound is crisp and there isn't any echo or muffle to the bass.Using them right now and have used them everyday for 1 to 10+hours a day for 2 full months. Sound hasn't downgraded at all.The in-ear parts of the headphones are very comfortable and are very light so you barely notice them while wearing them.The cord is relatively fragile feeling but no more then any other basic headphones.Further update: It has now been well over a month and they are still working and no noticeable degradation of sound quality. Easily the best earbuds i have ever bought.Overall I am very satisfied with them and will purchase again if the need arises.

review_bold: GREAT bass response, comfortable and lightweight!
review: These sound great, period. I hate the hard plastic buds that came with my iPhone. I have a small ear canal and need buds with silicon ends that fit snugly into my ear. My old Samsun Galaxy S4 buds sounded GREAT, but they started getting crackly and the left ear went out after about 3 months of almost daily use. I didn't trust the "Samsung" earbuds on here, too many fakes and imitations. I saw these were top rated with over 35k reviews. I have to agree, these sound exactly like what I was looking for. They have soft tips with three different sizes, the bass response is EXCELLENT, and they weigh next to nothing. Plus the blue version was only Â£10.10. Perfect.

review: These are really amazing ear buds.1st of all they fit exactly right for me.2nd they do come with replaceable buds that come in large to small sizes.3rd it has really good bass4th the build quality is excellent.5th price is really cheap!6th out of other headphones i tried, this is the best.-imo7th they do not slip out of the ear because of it's ergo-fit, it's at a slight angle so it won't actually slip out! tight and snuggled.8th they slightly bleed - but cares if you love music :)9th i could not hear myself talking while listening to music - teehee10th overall; great product!I would recommend these to anyone looking to replace their headphones like the ipod stock ones or any other crappy headphones!

review: These guys don't quite look as pictured because of the angle. They are offset buds with a shelf the sits in your ear. They are THE most comfortable headphones I've ever had. The sound is great and the quality is VERY durable. I highly recommend these. The have a covering at the base of each bud to keep the wires from bending or wearing out quickly. The only downside is that the audiojack is a 90 degree plug rather than a straight in plug. This is great for stationary listening at a desk, but not mobile listening as the wires will bend and wear quickly. I hope they make updates to newer models and maybe include a protector for the wire on a straight jack.

review: You can't leave home to go anywhere without an electronic device. For the most part those devices can play your MP3's. So the next logical progression is not to leave your house without Ear Headphones, to listion to music or watch vids on the go. So why these?- Don't take up much space, so why not take 'em?- Music quality is excellent, like mini speakers in your ear- Way comfortable, the most usable and secure ergo design I have ever used.- Had these for a months and still in love.Oh and since they are not expensive, their small size is benefical since there will be more money in your pocket taking up room.Costs less than a six pack and last longer. Get them.

review_bold: They sound good to me and work well for the purpose I ...
review: I bought these for use with the mp3 player I use while working out. I've had problems with in-ear headphones not fitting properly and falling out -- even when they came packaged with several sizes of pads. These stay in. The only time they come out is when I pull them out or the cord catches on something -- which rarely happens since I run the cord down the inside of my shirt (with the mp3 player clipped to the waistband of my shorts).I'm not an audiophile. I generally can't tell the difference with supposedly higher fidelity/quality products. They sound good to me and work well for the purpose I bought them for. All for an inexpensive price.

review_bold: Amazing Quality, Cheap Enough to Be Disposable
review: These are great earbuds for there cost. I've gone through a few pairs of these (each lasting over a month, not bad for less than Â£10 and daily use). My favorite feature of these earbuds is how well they drown out noise, despite not technically being noise-cancelling earbuds.I've got a few brand new sets of these in a drawer for when my current pair go bad (either from one side being blown, or from static electricity caused by removing a sweatshirt while wearing them, etc). They produce excellent quality sound and are fairly comfortable, especially relative to their cost.You can't go wrong with these if you're looking for cheap and reliable earbuds.

review_bold: A very good value for the price.
review: These in-ear headphones, costing less than Â£10, are a great value for their low price.They're designed to fit snugly in your ears, and they come with a few different sizes of the little rubber covering over the sides of the speakers to ensure that they will fit any size of ear. I haven't noticed any issues with sound quality.The wire has gotten caught on stuff from time to time (as wires tend to do), but I have not seen any damage to the wire or the earphones themselves.As long as you find the correct fit for the earphones, they will serve you well. Probably the best choice on Amazon if you're specifically looking for low-cost in-ear headphones.

Description:

review: These little earbuds trump every single other in it's price range in terms of sound quality and clarity. Not only does this little package boast high quality sound, but also uses the best in-ear ergonomics I've experienced in any earbud; each headphone fits into your ear snug, and you can barely feel that it's there once you have it in for a bit, and they won't fall out unless you pull from a certain angle. I had to switch out the medium rubber buds to the larger ones to have it fit snug into my ear. They still work perfectly after about 2 months of rough use, which is amazing for something this cheap. You don't always get what you pay for!

review: These headphones are great, especially for their price! The sound quality is surprisingly good, and compare to my past earbud purchases in the Â£100 range. I use them for listening to music (pretty much any genre), YouTube, TV shows, and for phone calls (no, they don't have a mic). So far I haven't found anything that sounds bad on these! They fit securely in my ear and are very comfortable, although I did put in the provided larger size earbud. The one thing I would say isn't so great about these earbuds is that the wire feels fairly cheap, but for Â£10 it is to be expected and if they break it's not a big deal since they're so cheap.

Description:

review: So I bought these headphones because I read a review of them on cnet.com's list of low cost headphones that are big hits. I have to say I am impressed.These have really great sound! I got these to use in place of some noise canceling headphones I have from Sony as they hurt my head after a while, and these are really great! They sound very rich, and they are incredibly compact and easy to throw in a bag and take with you. That being said, I think they could get pretty tangled up easily, so I am careful to not put them anywhere without wrapping them neatly first. But if that doesn't bother you, these headphones are an incredible, rumbly bassy bang for your buck.

review_bold: Does not get better for the price!
review: So I had been using my ipod earphones for months, but I never liked them; they never fit well and I could not hear well. I like earbud type earphones because they fit in the ear canal and I have no problem listening to whatever it is I'm listening to, and they block noise better. I got these because they were cheap, no other reason, but was pleasantly surprised. The first thing I noticed was the deep bass, I dont love it but It's still better than the flatness of my old earphones. Sound quality is pretty good (again, for the price). And my wife gets mad at me because I don't listen to her (meaning these are pretty good at blocking nagging... I mean, noise.

review: Up to par with some of my Skullcandy's that are Â£100 to Â£100. I don't know how they keep up but I'd rather buy Â£10 headphones than abuse the unlimited warranty (crap warranty by the way, sent them over a month ago, still have not processed) that come with the crap for buds I got from SC in comparison to these at least. Hopefully these can take a beating, well, meaning, I can sleep with my headphones in, because I certainly can't with Titan's and 50/50s. I'm hoping that these will last as long as people say they will.As far as the product goes, I am pleased with how they have sound and how they feel in my ears, makes a great first impression.

Description:

Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review: These are amazing! I've never written an amazon review, but I couldn't help myself. I've purchased so many pairs of headphones ranging from Â£10 to Â£100. I always seem to misplace them OR one of the earbuds goes out OR they get that crackling sound. So perhaps these will only last a couple months, as some other people said. But they're so cheap and the sound quality is unbelievable for the price! They remind me of very high end earbuds. The noise cancellation (with the proper earbud size) is so strong, I keep being worried someone is going to sneak up behind me. I can't recommend these enough. My ears are so happy with this lovely sound.

Description:

review: So many different types of headphones to buy, how do you choose? I honestly went for price and name recognition. I was pleaseantly surprised with the sound quality and how comfortably these ear buds sit in my ears. Very easy to place and they stay well. I use them mostly for watching online TV shows as well as playing video games on my PS3 (while hooked up to a small TV). They do a fine job of muffling outside noise (does not completely block outside noise). Highly recommend.

Description:
Superior Sound Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with deep bass and crisp highs. These earphones are engineered to deliver an immersive sound experience, making your music, podcasts, and calls sound better than ever.
Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Convenient in-line controls allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, making it easy to take calls on the go.
Universal Compatibility: These earphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. The standard 3.5mm jack ensures easy connectivity to any device with a headphone port.
review: The sound is literally amazing!!! The sound quality is very noticeable, it is just as good as my Bose. When I first opened the packet, I put my phone volume to the highest because I thought the sound would not be loud but I shouted in grief because it was so loud! I think it would eventually increase the price because right now its a steal, but they made it affordable with the thin wires and light earplugs meaning it can be forgiven for spoiling early.

review: These are the best headphones you can buy. I've been personally buying them for months. Not only do they sound amazing, but they are very durable. The only reason I keep buying new ones is because my friends keep taking them from me. First, they'll ask to borrow my headphones and next thing I know, they're gone. Even my kids take them from me. They say these are the best headphones they've ever used. And that's pretty impressive coming from teenagers.

review_bold: These cheap little earphones have really surpassed my expectations. ...
review: These cheap little earphones have really surpassed my expectations. It's certainly not high resolution sound, but they also cost Â£10, and I'm very impressed with the fidelity and range of sound they produce. I use mine while running on the treadmill and while I'm commuting to work on the subway. I've had trouble with earbuds in the past that don't seem to fit in my ears, but these work perfectly. For Â£10, what do you have to lose?

Description:

review_bold: You have nothing to lose. Sound quality is excellent.
review: These headphones are cheap. Very cheap. So cheap that I was breathtaking by the stunning audio quality that they had. It blew me away.The bass is teeming and the treble is as crisp as a leaf of lettuce. What else? I've put these headphones through the washing machine three times (by accident; I never check my pockets) and they still work fine. Even one round through the scorching dryer and these babies are going hard. I'll tell you right now that more. Expensive Earbuds wouldn't have been able to handle the water because they rely on active subs to deliver sound that's equal to the ones that these produce.Buy a pair or five. It's not like you'll regret it.Only gripe is that the cord is very thin and easily gets tangled.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review_bold: Great sound, quite loud for how small it is
review: Great sound, quite loud for how small it is. The instructions are a little confusing, but with some tinkering, it's pretty easy to figure out. The light feature is a definite plus.

review_bold: If you're looking for headphones, this is your best bet. Great quality, Price, and Durable
review: Wow, for the price these cost it blows my mind on how good these head phones are. Best of all, I accidentally dropped the top of my rack on a ship onto one of the hearbud pieces and it still works. Very surprisingly durable and great sound quality. I have a friend who makes music on his spare time and needed to borrow these headphones and he was very impressed with the quality as well.You cant pass these up for the quality, price, and durability.

review_bold: These seem amazing for the price
review: These seem amazing for the price. I haven't actually owned a pair of this type of earbud before.. only the hard iphone ones. Based on that these are extremely comfortable. Also even with the volume low the bass is very strong. Another plus (for me) is that they don't block out a lot of noise. I can actually hear the clock nearby clicking even while wearing this. I use them at work so I need to be able to hear the phone ring and people walking by so another definite plus

review: These earbuds are so awesome!! I love how they fit nicely in your ear and don't fall out easily (if you put them on correctly). I have been searching for good headphones to run with that sound great and stay in my ear and I'm so happy I got these.The best thing is that they're a whole lot cheaper than other good headphones out there so if I break them (it's been a couple of months and they're still as good as new) , then I can easily replace them.

review: These are cheap headphones as far as price goes. No complaints with the sound quality at all, the music sounds like it should. The first pair I got lasted me about 3 months (fair for the cheap price, and I run with these at least twice a week so that may stress them). The second pair I am still using and they have lasted me about a months so far. After these break (no telling how long due to the difference between 3 and a months) I will probably be buying these again.

I've heard some pretty lackluster buds near this same price range but these really take the cake.If you're looking for a pair of cheap and well performing headphones you won't find a better value than this.

review_bold: These headphones THE best that I have ever owned
review: These headphones THE best that I have ever owned. And let me tell you, I have owned a LOT of headphones. Before purchasing these, I had been cursed with buying a new pair every a months, having one of the headphones break internally before the other went too.I bought a pair of these headphones for the good performance of the reviews. These WILL not disappoint if you are looking for a long lasting pair of headphones! And for under Â£10, these will give you the best bang for your buck.

Sound quality is also very impressive for the price, i wish they were a tad bit louder but they are still sufficient.

This is our second pair. I bought my husband his, and after his rave reviews, I bought a pair for myself.

review: these work great. Ordered them after reading tons of reviews on amazon. For Â£10, you can't beat it. They sound great and stay put. I am a runner and have been using them for a month. They remain securely in ear running 1 1/2 hrs. Haven't used this pair further than that yet. I previously went through 3 pairs of sony earbuds and last pair didn't even last 6 mo- and they were about Â£15/each. Will see how long these last. Love them so far!

review: Work great as I expected. Worth the price. Just have to make sure I have them in the right ear or they tend to fall out. These new blue ones seem to tangle very easily unlike the black ones I had...I find that a little odd...but they are great and I recommend them. Great sound. Give them a try.

The sound quality is reasonable and I can actually hear pretty reasonable amounts of sub in my bass-ier music. I'm going to order a second pair.

review_bold: These are very comfortable. I have smaller ear canals
review: These are very comfortable. I have smaller ear canals, and the smallest size is very comfortable for me. These were the first in-ear headphones that I have been able to use thus far. They stay in place, and the cord is not too long, which makes it easier to use on my Ipod classic. Since I use my headphones for audiobooks, I don't have an opinion on how music sounds with them. My son has a pair and he says that they are good for this level of headphones.

review_bold: Needed a good pair of ear buds since my last one died
review: Reason: Needed a good pair of ear buds since my last one died.Product: It comes with 2 pairs of extra tips a smaller and a larger one. The medium size one that's on the ear bud itself fits rather comfortable in the ears. It's not heavily bass but the sound resonates well. You can hear the instruments, vocals and effects clearly with the right audio settings.Conclusion: You are getting a good quality ear bud at a rather cheap price.

review: YES! These are really nice ear buds. Sound quality is great (coming from a non-audiophile) and all I asked for. They are comfortable and fit perfectly for me! and probably for you too. They ship with 2 pair of interchangeable "buds" along with the ones that are already on the ear buds. They vary in sizes so it fits the hole in your ear! Wow, I need to learn all these terms, but leave a comment, if you have a question. I'll do my best to explain my ignorance. Or you can explain to me!What I'm trying to say is, for the money, these ear buds are awesome!Solid sound qualityGreat fitThey don't fall out when I'm doing moving aroundCord is adequate length in my daily useand you can't beat that price!

review: Since the airlines now charge you to listen to music, I bought this so my wife can listen to music on my smart phone when we are traveling by air. I was quite impressed by the high quality audio from these little ear buds. As stated in the product description, the ear buds come with three different size rubber ear bud covers. That was important because my wife has small ear canals. The medium bud covers were too big for her, but the small ones worked perfectly.

review: The sound quality is pretty good, but where these separate from the pack is the design. They sit firmly and comfortably in the ear. They dont need to be wedged and crammed to create the adequate amount of friction to stay put. These are actually designed to the contour of the ear with the rubber ball being inserted into the ear canal while the plastic casing is offset to sit in the pocket of your ear next to the ear canal making them stay in place without discomfort.

I've used them for about a few weeks here, I used them every day, I would recommend them.

review_bold: The quality of these headphones is far more than the price 10/10
review: These are the best headphones ever. I go to the gym 5-6 times a week and I use them while I mow the lawn as well. They really do cancel out all other noise and the sound quality is incredible for the cost. I bought a white pair about a month ago, washed them in the washing machine multiple times and they still worked awesome. I bought 2 more pairs for when the first pair go bad and to have some in my truck.

review: These earbuds are the best I've had. I've mostly bought low end earbuds in the past and have the Sennheiser HD202. All the low end earbuds break quickly because I step on them a lot. These have held up well. Chances are, they will break eventually but for the price, the sound quality is good compared to the other earbuds I've purchased. They're also comfortable and can have them in while sleeping on my side. Bass is decent for a budget earbud.

review_bold: These earbuds are seriously awesome. For the price
review: These earbuds are seriously awesome. For the price, you get a comfortable, very well sounding, and good looking set of earbuds. I use to use these for gym, traveling, listening to music at work, etc. I can have them in for hours and no issues.They sound GREAT for earbuds. I've tried a lot of earbuds ranging from Â£10-100. These lasted the longest and sounded the best for the price. I bought 2 extra pairs just incase I couldn't find them again.

Furthermore the company provides diffrent "cups" for the headphones which means that any kind of ear type will be able to use these. Finally when you put these on, the buds have an awesome silencing power, which means that you can barely hear any outside noise and are able to focus on your awesome music.

review_bold: This ErgoFit Earbuds Are The Best!
review: These are the most comfortable earbuds I have ever used. I use my iPod to play my meditation tracks. I also use it to play Super Sleep, a track I use every night to help me sleep more soundly. The earbuds that came with my iPod broke so I needed a replacement. I read all the reviews and took a chance on this earbuds and I am very glad I did. Sound is phenomenal and the fit and comfort, even when laying on them, are the best I have ever had.

review: This set of headphones fits in the ear comfortably--and it should, as there are three adjustable sizes. The sound quality is great, though the bass is lacking a bit. The headphones end in an L-shaped attachment that provides greater long-term durability for the wiring.It's just a solid pair of headphones at an extremely decent price. I would definitely recommend them as a replacement when your pre-packaged iPod headphones inevitably break.

review: These are fantastic headphones and I am shocked that they cost so little. They provide full rich bass that you can lose yourself in, but they also have surprisingly crisp middles and highs. I bought these to replace a lost pair of iPhone earbuds and the difference is shocking. I may buy another in an exciting color -- I went with boring black :)If they could release a version of these with a built-in microphone they would dominate the smartphone market.

review: Was hesitant because of the price and cheap buds always seem to fail on me. I cannot address the quality in terms of durability because I just received these but as far as sound quality, they sound GREAT. I've been through a lot of cheap earbuds and these are the best by far. Not sure what people are talking about when they say no bass response. Has very clear tone and good low end. Very happy...as long as they don't break in a few weeks.

review: These are honestly some of the best headphones I've ever owned! Needless to say they are also extremely afortable for people who are in a budget like me. I don't really like people talking to me, so I love that they are sound isolating. The quality is extremely good in my opinion. Overall, your getting awesome sound quality, great sound isolation, all for an afortable price. And it's all compacted into a sleek, cool, comfortable design.

I've been using these for awhile now and I can totally echo the other positive reviews here.

I got free amazon gift cards off that site which is how I bought this awesome product. I listen to rap with a lot of base and was worried that these wouldn't live up to my standards considering i LOVE bass. Would recommend to anybody looking for cheap earphones with great quality.

review: These earbuds are the best cheap ones around. When firmly in your ear they sound great with good base. The odd angled offset design keeps in in my ear when running and walking, unlike earbuds designed straight "inline." I often have my Bose QuietComfort 2 headphones next to me but I just use these because I find it a little handier. The sound quality is not as good but I consider it close.

Sound quality is unexpectedly good, even after all the abuse they have received from me and my entropic lifestyle. These things hold 2nd place in headphones on Amazon for a reason. Way better build and slightly better sound quality (except bass) than those overpriced Beats earbuds.

review: These things are awesome. End of story. They fit great and sound great. Do a remarkable job of blocking outside sounds for how simple they are. I've been showing them off to my classmates I'm so impressed. Unlike skull candy they don't have to jam in your ear. The rubber part is at an oblique angle to the diaphragm, which makes it slide perfectly into your ear canal. Would definitely recommend to anyone in need of some great buds.

They also come in handy for listening to something of my choosing when hubby is watching , 'Cops' . Can't fault them or the price .

You can always get another pair if you lose them without burning a hole in your pocket. I highly recommend this product.

A final note; these sound better than previous pairs that I have owned that cost Â£100+ Highly recommended!

review: Whether I'm doing work, watching videos, or listening to music while working out, these headphones keep me concentrated on my studies, plugged in to my shows, and focused and in the zone. I recommend these for everyone looking for a pair of casual, long lasting, and simple earbud headphones!

review: These headphones work great! The smallest size fits my ears and I can hear the bass just fine. My boyfriend tried them, but his ear holes are larger and found he couldn't hear the bass well, but he probably needs a different sized bud. The buds go pretty deep in the ears, so it blocks out a lot of the outside noise, which is great, especially when I'm on my bike and get sick of hearing the loud cars zoom by me. They are comfortable too. I'm a fan!

review_bold: Favorite Everyday Portables - But Try the Big Buds
review: Try the big buds! Seriously, the medium buds that came on them fit but sound horrible in my average sized ear holes (yikes, did I just say that?) The big pads also fit and make them sound 200% better.I gave up on three figure buds after losing a couple pairs and I think these provide almost the same quality sound for a fraction of a price.Buy three pair and scatter them around so you always have one nearby.

Comfortable Fit: Ergonomically designed for maximum comfort, these earphones come with multiple sizes of ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for all ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they can be worn for extended periods without discomfort.
Durable and Stylish: Made with high-quality materials, these earphones are built to last. The tangle-free cable and sturdy construction ensure durability, while the sleek design adds a touch of style to your look.
In-line Microphone and Controls: Convenient in-line controls allow you to manage your music and calls with ease. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, making it easy to take calls on the go.
Universal Compatibility: These earphones are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more. The standard 3.5mm jack ensures easy connectivity to any device with a headphone port.
review: This earbud is awesome! The sound quality of it is totally amazing! You could hear it so clear and nice! It's easy to tell which side is for your right and left ear, because if you put it on the wrong ear, it will feel uncomfortable. You will get used to it. I also like the feature of the thing that connects the ear buds to the device, it is thick and easy to move and plug in. Overall, this is awesome!

review: Wow!!! (And that's putting it mildly since cussing is frowned upon here) these are by far the best ear buds I've had. I've been through plenty looking for something with good sound quality. They knows what they're doing. You get the full sound, not just treble with these and you don't have to cram them in your ear super hard to seal it and hear the bass. I use the hell out of these. Highly recommend!

review_bold: great headphones(durable, good sound) for the price
review: So far I have been using them for over a month, I bought two (one of them I lost so thats why I bought a new one - im sure the first one would have lasted for a month by itself). I use them everywhere - traveling, gym, at work (sometimes) and almost whereever i want to listen to music by myself. They last forever it seems..**touch wood**. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking to buy it for rough use.

review_bold: Amazed at how good these sound for the price.
review: They fit very comfortably in my ear and have plenty of bass for my liking. They sound well balanced without too much emphasis on lows or highs. Maybe there's an expensive set out there which sound amazing for true audiophiles, but I would recommend these to anyone looking for quality without breaking the bank. They feel like they might even stay in place while working out without having to use around the ear clips.

review_bold: Great value, perfect for listening to music at work
review: Wonderful and simple. They fit in my ears well, they seal well enough to block out most ambient noise, they don't sound too tinny (sometimes a problem for these kinds of ear buds) and they wear pretty well for at least 3-4 hours at a time. For the price, they're worth checking out. They won't wow an audiophile, but if you're an audiophile why are you looking at budget earbuds in the first place?

review_bold: Best bang- deep bang- for your buck.
review: These are exceptional for less than Â£10 earbuds. I bought a pair as disposable workout earbuds. A month later after running, skiing, and traveling on the same pair and they're as true as the day I bought them. Great highs, lows, mids. Not going to beat Â£1000 over the ear headphones but undoubtedly the best sound you can get for under Â£100, let alone under Â£10. Cannot recommend highly enough.

review: Yep, all the other five star reviews are right. These ear buds are fan freakin tastic. The bass is deep, vibrating your teeth, and the highs are very crisp. I am not sure if I should give one star though, I may go deaf from listening to my music so loud. Lol. Remember, if they aren't working for you, change the ear pieces. I had too small of a size on first and the buds were average. I put a larger size on and I was blown away!

review_bold: These are the best affordable in-ear phones I have used.
review: These are the best affordable in-ear phones I have used. I have never treated them very well. I throw them on my desk at work and then into my backpack. They are usually a big tangled mess when I need to use them next. I have taken them abroad to New Zealand, Australia, and India. No issues. They keep working. Not bad for < Â£10. Until I find (or someone suggests) something better at the same price, I'm sticking with these.

review: These headphones rival some of the more expensive pairs I have purchased. I needed headphones for use in the lab and these are better than I could have expected. Given the price I was not anticipating much but they offer a comfortable, secure fit, and sound amazing. So far I have no complaints and would purchase them again. They do not offer much noise cancellation but for the price it will be very hard to find a better pair.

review: These are just great headphones overall! Much better than apple in my opinion becuase these fit and they fit comfortably! I can go running with these and not worry about them falling out, and the best part, is that these things are cheap, and durable! I've had a pair for from nearly a months before I had to get a new pair! These are just great headphones overall, and if you don't have these, get them now.

review: WOW! These earbuds are AWESOME. They feel really great and the sound quality is awesome. The price on these is great and the last a LONG time. I have bought a total of 9 of these earbuds over the last 1.5 or 2 months for me and my brothers and each 1 has lasted me about a months or so which is GREAT considering that they are only about Â£10. BETS earbuds EVER. I would definitely recommend these to anyone.

review: This type of earbuds, unlike the standard Apple kind, has always given me trouble. The rubbery pieces never stayed inside my ears and would always pop out after a few minutes. These earbuds are different; the design of each ear piece is such that it fits snuggly and does. not. budge. The sound quality is pretty phenomenal, especially considering the price tag! Comes with extra sets of squishy thingies.

review: The only reason I am giving this product 5 stars, is because the bang for buck. For about 3 bucks these earphones surpass expectations. They deliver decent audio, and last about as long as a Â£20 skull candy pair. I use these as backup earphones and have several pairs for the gym, school, and just about anywhere I would want to listen to music, but don't want to lose my primary earphones. Solid product.

review: These are easily the most comfortable in-ear headphones I have ever used. With other in-ears, I have to remove them after an hour or so. I can wear these for hours and not even know they are there. I know that sounds like an exaggeration, but it's not. Sound is not great, but it is very good. I wish there was more bass. Overall, I'm very happy with these and you can't beat the price.

review: These are some really decently made, and great sounding headphones for the minimal price that I paid for them. I would say they are comparable to the Â£100 Zune earbuds that came with my Zune - the sound is not audiophile quality, but it really does sound good enough for every day usage. At this price it would be hard to complain even if they didn't sound great, and have a nice look to them. Nice job.

Description: Experience clear sound with our Bluetooth speaker, made for easy carrying and strong build. Even though it's small, it gives powerful sound with good bass and clear highs. Enjoy long battery life and easy connection with your devices. Its stylish look and simple controls make it great for music, podcasts, and more, at home or on the go.
review: it works very well i love the lights on it. easy to pair

review: These ear buds outprefrom my Â£120 Logitech G930's and are SUPERBLY clear i have small ears so i chose the small isolaters or what ever they call them and they are Soft and the bass highs and lows go to 24Mhz (thats DAMN low) and the sound reproduction is almost as good as my 4 yr old Dolby 5.1 sound system they dont have a HUGE kick but the kick is PERFECT for someone who loves to hear everything

review_bold: Fit perfect, if they ever stop working I'll definitely reorder
review: Sound quality is 10/10, comes with multiple ear pieces to make sure the fit is just right. Use them for running and with my last set I had pull my headband down over my ears to keeps them in but not with these ones. Fit perfect, if they ever stop working I'll definitely reorder. Also, got caught in a rain shower with them and had no issues...not saying they are water proof but held up just fine.

review: They're very comfortable. I bought 2-sets originally, completely based on Amazon reviews. I had to purchase two more because other family members wanted these over the various name-brand sets purchased a long time ago. As none of us are audiophiles, we know that these are for basic use and that you can't compare them to BeatsAudio or Sennheiser, but the price, comfort, audio levels - our entire family loves these!

review: These headphones are fantastic. Great quality no matter what genre you're listening too. They sound just as good pumping bass with dubstep as they do when listening to metal. The only other in ear headphones I've used with this quality are the Skullcandy Titans, and these are for a fraction of the price. I cannot attest to their durability yet, but will update the review after some weeks of use.

review_bold: Can't beat them at 4x the price
review: These are my new "go-to" headphones. Can't beat them when you just need to listen to music or podcasts without wearing a set of huge over-the-ear headphones. If you are still using the pair that came with your ipod, give these a shot! A word of warning though, the do not have the controls or a mic for use with cell phones, but at this price, i would not have expected them to have that functionality.

review: These are great for running or doing any activity that requires movement - they stay in pace and cancel most of the exterior noise. The sound quality is really good for the low price. I have tried really expensive in-ear buds as well and though the sound quality is better, the quality of these affordable headphones does not too far behind. Only have had them for 2 weeks so can't review quality.

review: Wow cant beat the price. so I thought that the price would make the headphones crappy but they have good sound quality and neither of the headphones have gone out and they still work today for me and I have had them for a month. I like them a lot and are similar to ipod headphones just without the remote but the sound quality is the same. Buy it. it is cheap headphones. Delivery was quick too

review_bold: I often forget they are still in my ear!
review: Wow, these earbuds fit so well and are so free from hissing, that I often start looking around for my earbuds to put them in as I start up a game or video...not even realizing I have had them in all along! I go through buds very often, as I use them at work as a painter. For this reason I have been searching for low cost high quality buds...search ended. I love these and will buy them again. Highly recommend.

review: Wow, is all I can say. I'm listening to Tool's Undertow as I write this review, and it sounds absolutely great on these very inexpensive earbuds. I bought them just as a throwaway set to use while while walking to work everyday, but am very impressed with the sound. They are clean and have a great bass response. Perfect for what I wanted, sound much better than my previous Skullcandy set.

review: Really don't care what you all think, but cheap as this is it's all I buy, and I could afford something more expensive. Problem is, other people like my choice of headphones and so I lose these headphones too easily. The shape fits your ears just perfectly, they come in different sizes so they're super comfortable and they only cost Â£10. They'd be durable too if they weren't stolen so quickly, I'm sure.

review: I'm an audiophile, and "for the price" these are the best in ear headphones I've ever had. The only "con" I have with these is that you have to turn up the volume a little higher on your device to get the same volume level as with other similar headphones. These are even better than my "apple" ones that came with my device, due to the outside noise reduction/cancelling design!

review_bold: Excellent sound quality at an even better price!
review: What can I say, I was amazed that a pair of earbuds for under Â£10 work as well as these do. They sound great and they fit great. I typically have a problem with anything that goes in the ear causing pain with prolonged use. These do not cause pain at all. They include an assortment of attachments for all sizes of ears.These ear buds fully deserve the 5-star rating I am giving them. Good job !

review: The only ear buds that have fit my ear..in my entire life! Every ear bud I've ever tried falls out of my ear. I have small ears so I always try to wedge them in and they pop out. review: Sound quality and design are excellent. As stated by some, the headphones need a full seal within the ear canal to provide optimal frequency responsiveness and reproduce bass properly.I use the largest earbud covers that were included and they work well. They help the headphones provide excellent sound quality, aid in blocking external background noise, and are comfortable to wear.

Description:
Product Description:

Introducing the XuDirect In-Ear Earphones in a striking Black and Green color combination. These earphones promise an unparalleled audio experience with features and quality that seem too good to be true.

Key Features:

Enjoy clear sound with our wired earphones. They're compact but deliver decent audio with some bass and clear highs. The durable wire ensures a stable connection to your devices. Featuring a sleek design and easy-to-use controls, they're suitable for music, podcasts, and more, both at home and on the go.
review_bold: Great set of earbuds, especially for the price!
review: These earbuds do not disappoint! I read some reviews before ordering and, as a poor college student, needed the best bang for my buck. I decided on these buds and have not been let down. The highs and lows are both more than adequate and, though I haven't tried it yet, I believe these will fit and stay in my ears much better than my previous pair while mowing with ear protection.

review: These headphones stay in your ears really well, so they're good for walking around. The best thing about them is that they are still comfortable even if you're laying on your side with your ear against the pillow. The L-shaped jack is also a plus. They don't block out noise as well as the skullcandy ink'd headphones, but the sound is still better than the average ipod headphones.

review: The best. Great sound quality. I've also washed these by accident 2-3x and they seem to emerge unaffected. They stay in my ears very well.The price is really what makes them excellent. I used to have Bose earbuds and the sound was great, but I was always worried about losing or damaging them. It's great to not really care about these earbuds; if you lose a pair, just re-order them.

review: These ear buds were really surprising to say the least. There's not a lot to say that hasn't already been said but I want to mention what was surprising to me the most. I was taken off guard by how well the bass performance for these were. I've heard some pretty lackluster buds near this same price range but these really take the cake.If you're looking for a pair of cheap and well performing headphones you won't find a better value than this.

review: These are possibly the best ear-buds I have owned. I bought these based on all the positive reviews and I'm glad I did. I am really amazed at how comfortable these are. I have always had issues finding ear-buds that fit in my ears and don't make them hurt after a while. These sit very comfortably and I'm able to wear them for hours on end. Sound quality is ok. Not for the audiophile, but it does the job for casual listening. The cord is a little short to use for a computer, so I had to buy 3.5mm extension.Pros:- Comfortable- CheapCons:- Cord is short if using for a computer- Not the greatest sound quality

review_bold: Discreet, comfortable to wear and stay put.
review:
These are the first In-Ear headphones I've used that have actually stayed put.
I like to use headphones when I'm listening to my Kindle so I don't disturb anybody else but got fed up with In-Ear ones which kept slipping or falling out, so I've usually used over ear headphones which are uncomfortable if I'm listening in bed.
These come with a selection of little neoprene spongy caps for the earbuds for best fit and comfort and a microfiber baggie to keep everything safe.
There is a knack of hooking the little cables over your ears, but once they're on, they stay on.
The length of the lead from the earpiece to the jack is over a metre, so enough length but not enough to get in the way or tangle up.
An adjustable rubber clasp allows you to have the separate ear leads diverging at a comfortable distance to suit your headspace.
A small slider near the earpiece allows pause or replay.
There's no leakage of sound to irritate anybody nearby, and I'm not disturbed by external noise when I've got these on.
Only lost a star because I'd have liked a bit more 'body' to the leads where they fit round the ears - they're shown on the product pic, but not on the actual product - but it didn't really matter too much as they don't tend to fall off anyway, once you've got them on.
These are a good product, discreet and comfortable to wear.

Description:
>50% more powerful than the previous generation for fast streaming in Full HD. Includes Alexa Voice Remote with power and volume buttons.
>Stream more than 1.5 million movies and TV episodes from Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock, and more, plus listen to millions of songs. Subscription fees may apply.
>Receive a 6-month subscription to MGM+, including access to thousands of Hollywood movies and Original series with your Fire TV purchase. Terms apply.
>Watch your favorite live TV, news, and sports with subscriptions to SLING TV, YouTube TV, and others. Use the Guide button to see what's available and when.
>Access over 300,000 free movies and TV episodes from popular ad-supported streaming apps like Amazon Freevee, Tubi, Pluto TV and more.
>Listen on Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora, and others. Subscription fees may apply.
>Alexa Voice Remote lets you use your voice to search and launch shows across apps. All-new preset buttons get you to favorite apps quickly. Plus, control power and volume on your TV and soundbar with a single remote.
>Feel scenes come to life with immersive Dolby Atmos audio on select titles with compatible home audio systems.
>Plug in behind your TV, turn on the TV, and connect to the internet to get set up.
review_bold: This is great and I love it
review: What can I say about this device. I'm still navigating around everything it can do but first impressions are WOW!. This is great and I love it. Great films, and tv programmes, apps are plenty to discover and the music choice is just incredible. review_bold: Yep. Working, decent headphones for a fiver. If you've come this far, I'd suggest you just buy the damn things now.
review:
I first tried these out only yesterday, so there's that caveat. If they suddenly go wonky on me I'll update my review, but if not, this stands.
With that out of the way, I'm hella impressed with this purchase. I go through headphones with depressing regularity, losing sound in one ear after a month or so, and so have tended towards opting for cheaper offers such as Wilko's two quid ones. I use them mainly for R4 and podcasts rather than music, so that they're not plated with caesium or made from organically sustained dolphin-wood doesn't really factor into my decision. Not that I have anything against dolphins per se. They're very cute, especially when they do that flipper clapping thing. Yay dolphins.
Anyway, thus far I'm very impressed with the quality of these headphones. Utility, sound, and comfort all get top marks. Assuming they last, these appear to be fantastic value for money - and thanks to Business Insider for the article that pointed me in their direction.

Description:
Waterproof and sweatproof; ideal for high-intensity workouts with rounded ear buds ; 6 eartips in silicone rubber and foam included

Engineered by Amazon. Covered under Amazon Basics
review:
This is a well priced product with a premium feel, but unfortunately that's where the positives end. As a pair of headphones they fall short both in terms of sound and fit/comfort.
The sound completely lacks and bass, meaning that you end up with a tinny hollow sound. Adjusting the bass up on the EQ makes a small improvement but it's still not great.
Also, unless you have large ear canals you will struggle to find a bud that fits. I have small to average ear canals (i'm an audiologist so expert in terms of ear sizing) and even with the smallest tip it's pretty difficult to get a good seal. You do get a set of soft foam "comply" tips, but in my mind these are unhygienic and impossible to actually fit on the headphones.
I have only tried these headphones cycling so can't comment on how well they stay on your ears with more active exercise, but the loop should mean that you shouldn't lose them (unless your hanging upside down).

review: These have lasted me 2 years and are still going strong. I use them for jogging and due to their sound quality and ruggedness, I have also come to use them everyday as one of my main pairs of earphones. I was really surprised at the sound quality for their price. They have rich sound and very decent bass. These are my second pair as I lost my first pair. review: I bought these specifically for running and they do the job perfectly well. I am surprised at how comfortable and secure they are. Be prepared to do a bit of fiddling when you first open the box - you have to attach the plastic ear lobe pieces onto the cables and it can be tricky to get the correct orientation. Then you have to experiment with the different bud sizes to get the optimum fit - stretching the buds back on is really awkward. They come with two styles of buds each in three sizes. Sound quality is average and very acceptable for the price. Build quality feels good. The microphone is a nice addition. They also come with a pouch.

Description:
Waterproof and sweatproof; ideal for high-intensity workouts with rounded ear buds ; 6 eartips in silicone rubber and foam included

Engineered by Amazon. Covered under Amazon Basics
review_bold: Okay if you want something cheap & disposable
review:
I bought these earphones after the connection on my Creative in-ears got wonky. The packaging is great. The product itself... not so much.
The "sport" aspect is fairly low tech - you have to insert the cable into these very low-quality plastic ear 'cuffs'. But okay, I guess I couldn't expect more for Â£5!
They don't seem to mould to my ear as well as the other, despite my best attempts at getting them to fit snugly (and even after changing the bud "cover" to the smaller size ones, which were provided as is standard) The buds keep falling off after a few minutes, even if I'm just walking. Worse when I'm on the treadmill -- I'm constantly having to smash them back into my ear! When I get start sweating, it's even worse.
I've had non-sport earphones (like those Creative ones) that have stayed on much better even during intense workouts.
The sound quality itself is fine. Not amazing, but better than really cheap crappy ones. It's good enough for when I'm exercising, as I really just want the music there to distract me from my workout.
I think it's a good buy for Â£2- ?Â£3 as an add-on item as it seems to be right now. However, I got it for ?Â£5-ish and for that, I feel it is a bit of a waste. Oh well.

Lost my Bose Soundsport earphones in the gym, and so bought these. I was blown away by the snugly fit in my ears, and the superior quality of the sound. I jog almost everyday outside, or in the gym and these earphones are always on.
It's been exactly a month since I've been using them and they never slipped out of my ears and the summer sweat (especially in the gym) didn't affect the quality of the sound. Thanks Amazon.

review_bold: Some assembly required, but not necessarily a bad thing
review:
I've been running with these for about a month now, and have been generally pleased.
The ear hooks for the sport model are not attached to the wire out of the box. You have to feed the cable through yourself, leaving a small amount of wire between the earpiece and the hook. Initially, I ignored this and put the earpiece as close as possible, resulting in it being knocked out of my ear frequently. When I followed the instructions properly, all became clear and I have not had a problem with them falling out of my ears since.
The earphones are supplied with six different sets of earpieces, a pleasant surprise for a budget set, and it's worth experimenting to find the perfect fit. I have been using the smallest rubber set, and have found them to be very comfortable. Also included is a small carrying pouch with an Amazon Basics woven labels. The quality is good and consistent with other Amazon Basics products I have used.
The sound is clear. The bass is not heavy, but also doesn't distort when the volume goes up so it's a nice balance. That's going to be a matter of preference for people.
For the price, I would certainly recommend them.

Description:
Waterproof and sweatproof; ideal for high-intensity workouts with rounded ear buds ; 6 eartips in silicone rubber and foam included
Excellent sound quality and microphone in a portable and lightweight headphone
3.5mm jack with 90-degree angle ; 3.9-foot round sweat-proof cord ; carry pouch included
Works with smartphones, tablets, computers, MP3 players and other devices with 3.5 mm port
Engineered by Amazon. Covered under Amazon Basics
review:
I was a bit dubious about these, but bought them because they were very good value.
Firstly, I have wonky shaped ears, due to training in BJJ, and Judo. So usually, in-ear headphones don't fit. But - these do - even for me.
Also, the clever system for holding onto the ears is absolutely brilliant. The wires are threaded into the ear wraps, and they can be tweaked slightly to fit you perfectly. I've had lots of runs and they've never fallen out.
The sound quality isn't amazing,.. but its ok. If you've ever run with music you'll be aware that you 'hear' your feet hitting the ground, so actually this sort of negates the need for high quality audiophile sound quality.
***This next bit is a little gross***
My only slight regret, is that when you sweat (and you do when you run), the sweat in your ear stays in your ear... eg it cant escape past the pod. So you have to remove it to 'drain' your ear sweat... eugh!

>Stream more than 1.5 million movies and TV episodes from Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock, and more, plus listen to millions of songs. Subscription fees may apply.
>Receive a 6-month subscription to MGM+, including access to thousands of Hollywood movies and Original series with your Fire TV purchase. Terms apply.
>Watch your favorite live TV, news, and sports with subscriptions to SLING TV, YouTube TV, and others. Use the Guide button to see what's available and when.
>Access over 300,000 free movies and TV episodes from popular ad-supported streaming apps like Amazon Freevee, Tubi, Pluto TV and more.
>Listen on Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora, and others. Subscription fees may apply.
>Alexa Voice Remote lets you use your voice to search and launch shows across apps. All-new preset buttons get you to favorite apps quickly. Plus, control power and volume on your TV and soundbar with a single remote.
>Feel scenes come to life with immersive Dolby Atmos audio on select titles with compatible home audio systems.
>Plug in behind your TV, turn on the TV, and connect to the internet to get set up.
review: Unfortunately the stick arrived late and was synchronized with the wrong account. After that was sorted out it now works but often says the WiFi is dropping out when in the menus, which it isn't, when playing content there is no issue. Might just be me, but not a great experience so far. Needing another plug is a little awkward as well. Put one extra star now because after a few months the installation problems are long forgotten and the product has improved. Still seems to be the only device in the house that can't always get a connection though...

review_bold: I think a lot of people will be blinded by the price of these over the poor quality. They sound 'tinny' and cheap
review: I ordered these as I go running and listen to music. I know there cheap, but come on, at least be half decent at what your meant to do. I think a lot of people will be blinded by the price of these over the poor quality. They sound 'tinny' and cheap. Not that comfortable, managed to change the ear foam bit so it would stay in my ear. For a fiver buy the jvc gumy, much much better quality.

review_bold: Sport in ear. For less than Â£2. 50 ...
review:
Sport in ear. For less than Â£2.50 you really couln't ask for more...could you?
The range of accessories is impressive. Neat case, with plenty of spare eartips of varying sizes.
The sound has solid mid bass impact and the soundstage is decently sized. Quite clean instrument separation but with sibilant/sharp highs.

review_bold: Not that durable. Failed after 3 weeks of Gym use.
review: Worked fine...until they didn't. After just three weeks the foam ear plugs disintegrated and one of the earbuds stopped working. Bought many excellent AmazonBasics products and this is the first one that has failed. Quite disappointed. For the cost involved it's not really worth my time returning them. Will look elsewhere.

Engineered by Amazon. Covered under Amazon Basics
review_bold: It's a bit light in bass but the fidelity is good. I find the volume to be lower than ...
review:
A reasonable set of phones, just about worth the price.
Sound quality is reasonable given that they are aimed at sports and therefore have to be somewhat more rugged and sweat resistant than a typical pair. It's a bit light in bass but the fidelity is good. I find the volume to be lower than a typical pair of cheap in-ear buds.
The buds themselves are very large and unweildy, no idea why they need to be this big. Certainly not discreet and when you clip the cable through the over-ear supports (which are needed to keep them in during vigorous exercise) they become quite difficult to put on and adjust for best sound.
The microphone is a decent bonus and adds utility, which makes the set just about worth the slightly discounted price I paid on a lightening deal. I would have a look around at other options before paying full price though. I have a couple of pairs of other cheap sports headphones which sound a lot better but they aren't in-ear making them unsuitable for use if you are wearing a hat or helmet, e.g. for cycling.

review_bold: Good enough sound quality and noise-blocking, one minor irritation...
review:
One star lost due to the rather odd behind-the-ear clips that you have to put onto the wires yourself. There are so many headphones out there, and this pair is sold as 'Sport In-Ear Headphones', why not just have the clips fitted at the factory. Having to fiddle about squeezing the wire into the ear clips, trying to get the actual headphone in the right position - quite frustrating. After all that, there will still be a piece of flimsy wire between the clip and the headphone, so the benefit of having something solid behind the ear, forcing the headphone to remain in place, is lost.
Anyhow - the sound quality is fine for a budget model and, once you have the correct size earpiece in place, outside noise is blocked quite well, although you will need to push them back into your ear properly every now and then.

Engineered by Amazon. Covered under Amazon Basics
review_bold: The sound of these earphones is excellent
review:
I got these on offer for a very good price.The sound of these earphones is excellent, it is of a similar quality to much more expensive alternatives, the bass is quite pronounced - this is something I consider a positive, but if you disagree, it's generally possible to lower the bass volume on your phone, tablet etc. I found the rest of the audio to be quite clear, being able to easily hear all instruments played in music - be it classical or rock.
The earphones come with quite a few sets of buds, to choose from if they don't fit into your ear too well. I'd recommend trying out some of them, in order to find the best fit, as this has a big effect on how good the earphones sound. It also comes supplied with a small cloth bag, which you can use as a carrying bag for your earphones, or to store the extra buds. .

review: Very impressed. We are not techies, but this was just as easy to set up as it said. Plug into an HDMI port, follow the instructions and within minutes we were up and running! It's what we wanted - access to movies etc. as advertised, plus can move it from one TV to another really easily so can watch more on basic Freeview TV's in the kitchen and bedroom. Great little thing, No problems at all so far!
